lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good evening, and welcome to another episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around playing Dungeons and Dragons, which is what we're going to do this week, we're going to play some goddamn Dungeons and Dragons. I've had crap bouncing around my skull for two weeks. I don't know how Matthew does it. I don't ever want to do it again, but I'm excited for tonight. Ah, so welcome to my little one-shot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I love it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What can we talk about? Hey guys, pay attention to the video after our little welcome here, because there's going to be some extra stuff, and you guys, the cast, are verboten to look at your smart phones, watches and stuff.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Verboten from social medias.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: We won't see any of your texts.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yar.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: That's all.

lines.name: TRAVIS, MARY
lines.text: (speaking German)

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yeah. Well, that goes without saying.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're introducing the characters a little early, but that's okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What are they saying? What's happening?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, I'm so chomping at the bit to fall on my face, let's do our announcements so that we can get to it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey! This week's episode's brought to you by Lootcrate! The amazing Lootcrate, of which we have a new crate to unbox. Grab your boxes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, are we all doing it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Open up. This is their anti-hero box.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What? Oh my god, what a charmed life we lead.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is their anti-hero box. Well look who's ahead of you, and immediately, I am greeted by an Archer shirt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's so hard! Why are you guys so fast?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: This table's losing.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Sterling Archer, oh my gosh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Ooh! What size do you have?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have a medium here.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: We're going to switch boxes right now, tiny tiny.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dude, we have Kill Bill socks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh my gosh! It's the right hand of doom from Hellboy! Is this made just for me?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hey, are these Kill Bill Socks?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They are.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's amazing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey look. World of Warcraft pins.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You are the biggest Hellboy nerd I know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Stop the show! I'm going home!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Oh, World of Warcraft pins! Everyone, please get the new expansion, it's fantastic.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And Harley. Ah, Harley. Just waiting for Mr J.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, puddin'!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Woo! That is your anti-hero Lootcrate box that is out right now.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: What is this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You turn the boxes inside out and they become something cool. Something to do with that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's the Hellboy fist. Look at that. A sexual toy. A big red fist.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, look! It tells you how to do it! Transform your crate.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Into what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And coming up, they have a speed-themed box.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, into a mallet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, well, they're probably the little blue hedgehog's color.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: But your Hellboy fist is red.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's right. And you also have a Transformer's wearable for your world-saving needs. And a MarioKart tee.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I think if you wear glasses, this shirt is 3D.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I'm making that up, but it would be really cool.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh. I wish you weren't a liar.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And as always, the promo code: Lootcrate.com/criticalrole. Three dollars off your subscription.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Smooth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And a special message from this-- no, there's actually no special message. But maybe we'll work that in later.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: China.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, really? (laughs) China.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Thanks, Lootcrate!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to be walking around my house naked in an Archer t-shirt.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I've been getting the DX boxes? Is that what they are, the DX boxes are flipping awesome as well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aren't they?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: They're amazing. They're really legit, so go for it, dudes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ah, legit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And the LootBags, the LootPackages...

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yeah. I want to try the LootWear.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't steal my stuff when the show is over.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Don't any of you guys touch my stuff.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it? He's here! It's real! It's happening, it's happening!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's more!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on in there. Come and sit down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hi, guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Say Lootcrate three times.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Lootcrate, Lootcrate, Lootcrate?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You did it already?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You missed it. Yep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The man is out of breath.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As far as other announcements go, the only one that I'm aware of, please add in after me, but a bunch of us are going to SacAnime.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Raise your hand. Oh, five of six.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Minus one Ashly Burch.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Sorry, Ashly.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, it's fine. Cool. Cool, guys. It's fine. It's no big deal.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sacramento doesn't want you, Ashly.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: That's right. They told me.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't want them, either, so fuck it! Whatever.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We've got some super-sized carry-on luggage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Fuck Sacramento! I'll say it on air right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. Don't say that!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Fuck them all! No, I actually really like SacAnime. I've been there before. They're great.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Have you guys been? I've never been to SacAnime.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You haven't?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: It's my first. Steve and I will be there Saturday and Sunday. Steve Blum.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think I've been there eight or nine or maybe ten times. I don't know why.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Friday, Saturday, and Sunday, we'll be there.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Are you going to be all right over there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! I rolled two 20s in my pre-rolls.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Why would you do that now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know what? Later, you can slide them out, positioned like that. How's that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like it. Thank you. I appreciate that, DM.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, thanks for letting us cheat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, as a thin stream of wee goes down my leg, why don't we dig in? Let's cut to the video, because I'm so excited to go!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're cutting to a video?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you have any announcements? Is there anything fun in your life?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, we'll be at SacAnime--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you want to talk about Loot Crate, too?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I... nope? (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Welcome back. I am very excited to share with you all what has cooked inside my head for two weeks. Before we go, I think it would be cool to really quick, to clarify for the audience, could you all introduce yourselves, your name, your class, your race. That's racist.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My mouth is full!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We can start on this end.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hi! My name is Devan Bluebutton. I spit as I said it. I'm a halfling! And I'm a sorcerer.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: My name is Delweth, I'm a wood elf. I have no last name, like Cher. Actually, my last name is Cher. Is that it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've got naan in my teeth.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: That's his name, Naan-in-Teeth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sounds like a lot of thought went into that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I texted Travis about five times over a period of a week saying, "Hey man, you know, give "me a name at some point so I can start." Crickets, crickets, crickets. Finally, I'm like, "Hey man, "I'm going to go with Tarvis." "Yeah, sounds good." (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Brilliance, inspiration incarnate. And I am a half-orc.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: What's your other half?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also an assassin, and what's your intelligence? What's it say on there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, what's your intelligence?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I am smart as balls, y'all, 18!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Quantum physics, that's my shit.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Oh, I'm a rogue.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, and I am Obby the Rat. I am a dwarf. I am a rogue. That's it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Happy to have you!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And you're handsome.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: You have the best moustache ever!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Really, I'm just procrastinating, we should do this. Okay!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's get it on!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's get it on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! We got music!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: This is exciting!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There we go!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh man!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm so nervous!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm nervous for Liam because he has to be under a lot of pressure right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But not so for you four. One of the Clasp's countless hidden cells, you've been keeping warm and cosy in the Diamond Nest tavern, waiting for word from Spireling Shenn. You already know the task that awaits you. You've been over it. All that is left is for the Spireling to set you loose. The Diamond Nest isn't horribly busy this evening, but there are a few patrons scattered about, trying to warm themselves by the fire, trying to warm themselves with drink. You've been here since the late afternoon, hiding from the rain, and tedium set in hours ago. You've all been pretending to nurse the same drinks since the sun went down, and after minutes of staring at the wall, out of the corner of your eye, Delweth, you notice the door to the kitchen swing quietly open, and a familiar figure come strolling over towards your table in the corner. It's Garthok, a lean looking half-orc you've run with a handful of times. The rest of you finally notice him as well, as he slides up to the table. "Evening, friends."

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Hello Garthok.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "You all as bored as you look?"

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Pretty much.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He looks towards the opaque windows facing out on the street, the sound of heavy rain spattering against them. "I'd hate to be the poor schmucks wandering around out there tonight." (chuckles) He looks back to you. Stares you dead in the eye. "He's waiting." And with that the half-orc heads across the tavern and seats himself at the bar. Over the next few minutes, starting with Dren, you leave, one at a time, slip through the kitchen, down into the secret passageway that leads to the Clasp's headquarters below the Diamond Nest. And Dren, while you wait for the rest to catch up with you, you make your way down a long hall, nod at one of your brethren standing, watching at a door. He unlocks it for you. Past the door reveals your charge, Devan, lying on a bed, who sits up and looks at you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hi. (giggles) Hi, Devan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's going on out there?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, we're very bored.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you heard anything from Shenn?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, mostly everyone's been drinking. There was a half-orc who's a little scary, and I wanted to see-- do you need anything? Do you need like food, or water, or--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you're so kind. I think if you brought me anything they might catch on, though.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, right, okay. I worry about you. You know, alone, in the dark.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I worry about you, too. I think the sooner that we can get to the house the sooner we can end all this.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's true, okay. I wrote a haiku for you, do you want to hear it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I would love to.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. What's your last name again?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "Should I pull up a chair for this and watch? I could get some popcorn."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh! Silence prisoner! Hi, sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ow, it hurt when you hit me a second ago.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hi, I was checking--who--how are--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "You know the Spireling is waiting for you, right?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh! I'll go right now, to go-- don't you go anywhere!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (scared sound)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh yeah, you better be scared. Yeah, I'm going, I'm gone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "Bring the girl."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, right. I lock the door and--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Any last questions before I send you out?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Describe item again?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "All right, I will. It's hard to miss. It's a gem the size of a skull-- an emerald, as big as "your head, sir."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Obby has big head.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "That you do. Tarvis, do you have any real questions, or are you good to go?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I'm ready to roll whenever everyone else is.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm ready.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yeah, all right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He walks up to you, Tarvis, and-- right up close to you-- takes a little latch on your armor and tightens it and says, "Now, bring me my prize."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Of course, Spireling.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "I know you won't disappoint."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Never dream of it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He then walks over to you, Devan. "Miss Bluebutton, I hope you will put your trust in our "very capable hands. I'm sure with your guidance your grandmother's precautions will pose little "problem. My people will keep you safe. Just do as your escorts say, and there's no reason why things "should go any differently than our little test runs over the last couple weeks."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "Once Tagmut's Eye sits on this table, you will be free of your debt, as promised."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "I'm a good judge of character. I've no doubt you'll do fine. Go."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Now?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bluebutton's home-- Adelaide Bluebutton, your grandmother, the Shrew--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She is a shrew.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's over in the Central District. It's a ways off from the Graveyard District where you're starting. And even though The Rat hasn't been down this stretch of tunnelwork before, with maps procured from city planning, he's able to guide the party there without any trouble.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I follow my nose.

lines.name: MARY, LIAM, SAM
lines.text: It always knows.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispers) I've got rain.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Ooh! LIAM; And this is the plan: looking at the schematics here, you know that the main pipe leads to two smaller-- big enough for Tarvis, barely-- to shimmy up to two separate runoff drains on her property. So that's the plan. It might be a little trickier than anticipated because of the rain, but you can certainly have at it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And we pick one or the other?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well initially it's one, and then it splits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Obby and I work together a lot, so we're familiar with each other, wouldn't you say?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, I'd follow you anywhere, Tarvis.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Anywhere.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's very smart.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Delweth I've been learning a little bit more about.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dren, not quite so sure what it is that you do.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I guard Devan, our prisoner. And on the side I'm a bit of a poet. And I also assassin people very well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good. How do you like to assassin people?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Stealthily? Usually.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With your hands?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, I have like a crossbow type of situation going on.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice. A little range action.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Delweth, would you mind sharing with Devan what exactly you do to people like her in case she thinks about running off or leaving--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not going to run anywhere.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, it's a hypothetical deal, you'll enjoy this.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Starting at the head, or at the feet?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know what? Dealer's choice.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Obby prefers the feet.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is violence, not the other stuff.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is this really necessary? She's being very well-behaved.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: You're rather small, so I can't really wear your skin as a suit, but I could try. Maybe do-- I'd like a skirt, I'd probably make your skin into a--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hey guys, maybe we should pick a way to go!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was lovely, thank you for that.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I could flay you alive.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that's really nice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tarvis.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Even though this Dren is guarding our prisoner, we are all allowed to kill her if she acts up, correct?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, did I not mention that, in the Clasp, yes, if you betray one of your own, we will turn you inside out and wear you as a hat.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Oh, all right, a hat's all right, too.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But Dren knows that

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I know that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You knew that already, didn't you?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah yeah yeah.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: She's small too. It'd be a small hat, but a nice one.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I wouldn't make a very good hat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does anyone have a preference? Marching order into the pipe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will go first.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. Let me tell you story-- you know why they call me Obby the Rat?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I mean, I do, you want to tell them?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because I am small. Like rat. I go first.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. It is not easily walked into, it's about 15 feet above all your heads. 17 feet above yours.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will climb up there. Will it be an easy climb or difficult climb? (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to die, I wasn't ready for this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With very limited accent abilities.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If you'd like, you can make an acrobatics check to get up to the pipe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hold my torch. Acrobatics. Ooh! 22.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, you are a spry-- you're skinny-mini for a dwarf. You scrabble up, parkour off of one corner and then leap out and manage to catch with your hand and hang from it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I look back down at them. (clicks tongue)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And then you yank your butt up inside. It is slick and slimy from plant matter that has gone through here, and also there is water rushing in your face. You're getting toileted on for the most part, here. I'd also make a quick strength check to make sure you don't get flushed out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Already?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like a cat, you go up on the ends of your fingers and the ends of your toes and all the water scoots out under you. Okay, as he scrabbles up, Delweth, you, bored and not interested in the dwarf's ass, are staring at the wall, and you notice off to the side a single brick maybe an inch out of the wall. It's nothing major, but it bumps you a little because the rest of the tunnel is pretty level and clean.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I'm going to kill the party in the first five minutes. Can I do a perception check?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, without touching it, you get a bit closer and can see that it is loose. That's going to slide right in and out.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Hmm.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Brick in the wall?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yeah. Tarvis?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You don't see anything hinky.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, dear.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Tarvis, did you see this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: What do you think, Oh Great Leader?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hmm. You think it's trapped?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I do, actually.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe we should have Dren touch it.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sure. I'll touch it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You will?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, once you guys are all up there. What do we think it would be? Do we have to touch it?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: No, we don't have to touch it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not trapped!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you want to give it a touch? Oh!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You pull and not one brick, but four bricks all connected come out and uncover a flatter stone surface inside. And you're right up against it now and you see a very familiar circular insignia there of a rodent curled in on itself in a little ball. You know this. This is your grandmother's sign.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Siggle?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is a house seal. It's a siggle.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Siggle.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's the siggle of the shrew!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasp) I wonder if it works the way it does upstairs.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How does it work upstairs?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I pull out my dagger and I cut my hand with it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whoa!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I stick it on there. Anything?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, you remember how this works. It doesn't happen instantly, but you feel the blood seep from your hand into it. It stings a little bit, but it's not too bad. And after like 20 seconds, enough blood is pulled out and you hear a little (click) and the seal spins a quarter inch. And the door-- because it's a door-- pushes a little bit in.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ha! See? Yeah, it wasn't a trap. Good job, Devan!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good job, Devan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thanks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Proving useful.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I am useful! Also, I cast Dancing Lights and throw my torch on the ground.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Rolls into the canal, goes out, floats away, down in the rainwater.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: See guys?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And four beautiful globes of light swirl around Devan and light up, and shadows sparkle all around you. It's like a little disco--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Was that our only torch?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: --in the sewer. No, Obby's got one.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: No, we have two.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why do you need another torch?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So does the door open all the way? Or a little bit?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Oi. Devan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Huh?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Next time you think to throw something away, check with us first, please?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, but I've got lots of light, though.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I'm so glad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hat, remember. She'll wear you as a hat.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Skirt, actually. Yeah. With pleats.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could I check the partially open door?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure. You want to check it for danger?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would like to check it for danger.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure, make a danger check. Also known as perception.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, perception.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It looks good. I mean you'd know if there was something wrong with this. Seems fine. I mean it's a door, right? Doors open and close.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They sure do.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I check to see if I can fit through it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can almost fit through it. It catches on your armor a bit so you're through and it feels cool. And it's dark in there, you can't see shit in there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I send one of the dancing lights in with her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And follows you in a bit. And there's actually a way to step over to the right and go around. And you're in.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm in, guys!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well. Keep it up. We'll follow you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I borrow a torch or something?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I send another dancing light in.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Thanks Devan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're welcome.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A little gold ball dancing around the top of your head right now.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Check the walls for a torch.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: My perception is not great, but should I roll?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can. You don't see anything here.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't see anything here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a plain, flat, smooth, not curved but goes straight and then angles, and then angles again, and you can't see around the corner.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, so I could walk down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can make it through here, it will be very difficult, though. Where are you all?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Obby?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We found a secret door.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can come down from the number one and number two place?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should leave him up there.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: You want to?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, you can come down from the number one and number two place.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, Tarvis. I jump down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Despite being covered in-- it's not a lot of poo or anything.

lines.name: SAM, ASHLEY
lines.text: Mostly number one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You land and do a nice little dwarven three-point landing on one of the pathways. And now you three are standing there. You're at the edge, and you're inside.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Are there bricks around the door, or do we need to--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, you know that scene in Labyrinth where she's running down that long brick passage--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And the thing goes (spinning)?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, the one where it keeps going forever and she can't find any doors. It's like that. I mean, where the door was is uneven, there's teeth of bricks sticking out the sides, and the whole thing moved in straight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So it's a door.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, it doesn't come out, it goes in. And Dren was able to go (whoop).

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Does the door keep moving all the way down the hallway?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Devan, those dancing lights are awfully cute. Do you mind if I ask you how you came to be in the service of the Clasp?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let me re-jigger your memory, Tarvis. She's not in the Clasp--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. Why you're indebted to the Clasp?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, well. Yeah, well. So you know, gambling, huh?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I know gambling.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How fun is that?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's so fun!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dren.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But sometimes it gets you into trouble. And sometimes you can't pay off all your bills. And sometimes your grandma has a lot of gold and some treasure. And I said it and the Clasp heard me and now I'm stuck with you guys. But I'm totally on board and I'm real excited to help you out and be free of you at the same time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We clear?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good. Give Obby a hug for checking out that dangerous pipe for you.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: He's covered in number one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's okay, I am frequently used as punishment.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You get used to it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would like to stealth into the doorway and, moving forward, be on the alert for traps.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Would everyone like to make a stealth check?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't normally stealth, so that's a weird sentence for me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know. Nor do you have an intelligence of 18, but it's going really well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm trying not to speak as Grog.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 17, okay. And yeah, I would like a marching order, so how are you guys going in?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll be first through the door.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I'll be last.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll be number two.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll be behind Dren then.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. You've got a very scary elf behind you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. All right, so very quietly, even your gambling charge here, slowly creep around the door and curve around the side. And it is pitch black in here. You guys are fine, you can see in low light and pitch black. It's pitch black in here, or it was. And you see the tunnel stretch on really far. You can see maybe 40 or 50 or 60 feet ahead of you, but it keeps going and goes (whoosh) into black. It's a long tunnel, and there's nothing. It's very nondescript.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: We still have one torch lit, yeah?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And three dancing balls of light. Can I ask a question?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Cantrips.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How many do I get?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I just can do them?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All you want.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is amazing!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can make it rain with cantrips.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Seriously. All day long, all night.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Make it hail, baby. All right. That's gold coins.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As much as I don't want to rely on our prisoner, this would be a good opportunity to throw a light down the hallway.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I suppose you're right, Obby, maybe you should be the one to let her know that she can.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Obby says do magic trick.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go down the hallway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A little ball swirls in a spiral down the hall, and you watch this little circle, like a firefly, go further and further.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's 120 foot range.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. It keeps going, and then starts to dim, and then you lose sight of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come back!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And you wanted to check for traps, here, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. From where you are, it's a smooth, flat tunnel. It's plain. You guys want to move forward?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I pull out my rapier and hold it as we proceed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. All right. So you move forward, in a little conga line, down this tunnel. And it takes a while. You're walking. The sound of the rain, once I adjust, vanishes behind you. Come on, buddy, there you go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As we're walking, can I make the four lights combine together, in the shape of a human, all the way down at the end of the hallway?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure, in a rough--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it makes a humanoid form, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like one of those plastic signs that's shaped like a person on the street, saying like don't walk here because you'll slip.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It says you can, into a vaguely humanoid form.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's vague.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So yeah, you've got a gingerbread-shaped light man.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Down at the end of the hallway.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. He's standing there, like this, and goes-- And you can see him, you moved far enough along, you've probably gone about 100 feet at this point. You can continue to walk on down, or--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Tarvis? How are the traps looking? You seeing anything up front?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nothing yet, my dear.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you guys want to hear a haiku I wrote?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A haiku?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: What the fuck is a haiku?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's like a poem.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a 7/5/7 meter poem.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Obby!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not where I'm from.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure, Dren, we'd love to hear one.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Thanks, Tarvis! Wow, I really didn't think you were going to go for that. Okay. We walk down a thing. There is a bright man here too. We are all much friends.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You wrote that?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ahead of time?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah! I worked on it really hard.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: How long?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Couple hours?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As you're having this little walk-and-talk, down the hallway, Tarvis, you feel a little (click) under your foot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't. Move.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I stepped on something that clicked.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Who's got the torch? You do? Put it down by your feet. What do you see?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do I see?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You see one tile, pushed diagonally down about a half inch in. In a real odd way.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Real quick, everybody check the walls, ceilings, floors, see what this might unleash.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everybody make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Devan, you-- no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who got the 18? You got the 18? Okay. You guys both look everywhere, look all around, look up, and starting right above you, Tarvis, and stretching about 20 feet along the roof of this tunnel, are maybe 100 tiny holes in the ceiling.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it behind us too, or just in front of us?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It starts above Tarvis.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The duration of the hallway?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right where Tarvis is. Right where he has stepped.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could back up? We could just back up, then.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We hold Devan above us as a human shield and keep running.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's not smart! I'm the only one that can get you to the actual thing that you need!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Can I do a perception check to see how much weight pressure it would need to keep the tile down?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Investigation check?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: While she's looking at it, I'm going to send a message to--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: That's a natural one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: --to Dren. No one else can hear. I'm going to say: Hey! I'm thinking they might be catching on to something, so maybe it would be smart if we pretended that we didn't like each other a little bit more than we have been.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I know, I'm sorry, I'm trying really hard, I just like you a lot!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, I like you so much!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay should I be meaner to you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah maybe a little mean so they're not catching on as much.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Let's use her as a human shield!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow, Dren, that was really drastic.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Would you like to hold her up?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sure! Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was maybe a bit too much--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe not, Dren. I like your enthusiasm, though.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Thanks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Devan?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You have some tricks about you, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, I do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Any favorite spells that you like to use?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nothing that'll work on these things.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The holes?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Holes? On this trap? I can try casting Ray of Frost on the tile and freeze it in place.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's pretty smart.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, it might work. I can try it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's true, it might work, and you can try it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One could say, you can certainly try.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But Tarvis, in doing so, I might actually hurt your foot. But I don't want you to blame me, because I'm just doing it because I'm trying to freeze the thing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I appreciate your concern.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Well let's have a think for a moment, right? So it's not behind us, there's nothing in the ceiling behind us, it's just ahead of us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You don't see anything behind.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Little holes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The holes stretch above Tarvis for 15 or 20 feet.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: 15 or 20 feet. All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could all go, leaving Tarvis here.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Well what I was thinking, was what if I cast Mage Hand and pushed down on the tile, you take a step back, and we see what happens? And if it holds, then we can move forward, because the Mage Hand will last for 30 feet, and we'll be beyond the 20 feet of ceiling shite.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's really smart!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Objections?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do we know that it only goes on for 20 more feet? This tunnel?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The tunnel goes for another, I don't know, 100, 150 feet, but the holes that they noticed above Tarvis and moving about stop after about 15, 20 feet ahead.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I like your idea. Devan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How about you use your Ray of Frost on the holes, so that if anything decides to drop out of them, it meets a little stopper.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want to pick me up? Because I'm short.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Let Dren do it.

lines.name: TRAVIS, LAURA
lines.text: She's also pretty short.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure, Devan, I would like to do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I mean, don't get any ideas.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shall we?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: As we go, I hit a Ray of Frost. Okay.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I cast Mage Hand, and place the Mage Hand, direct it towards the tile that Tarvis is standing on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. And we're moving forward?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Nope!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As it appears, we'd like to do the old Indiana Jones like foot off--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Foot off, put on, and they take a step back, as she casts Ray of Frost to see whether or not it'll hold.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Obby the Rat runs.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Forward?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Forward.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Forward?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This will not work. I run.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: There's nothing behind us, Obby.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Obby bolts to the side of Tarvis and books it down the hall.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Obby!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He makes it like 15 feet, and you hear another little (click), and immediately acid starts spilling out of all the holes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Obby, Tarvis.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Son of a bitch! Like trickles of acid, or like a shower of acid?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A little spew of acid.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: So before you even got to step back?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: That's shit. Well done, Obby.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Both of you make a dexterity check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who, me, or them?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Both of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Am I on his shoulders at this point already?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who picked you up, Tarvis did?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Tarvis did.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, you make a dexterity check as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me too?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Was your dex check?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And you got what?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And you got?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 19, okay. Boy, this is crazy. Obby, hears like (hissing) and you do a dive and roll, and you feel a little drop of something splattering against your butt and burning into the seat of your pants a little bit. You immediately hear (hissing), and you wriggle free, like a cat, and scratch down along the side of Tarvis, and Tarvis, you take a big ol' dump of acid on your head, and take seven points of acid damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Seven?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh Jesus. I miss Grog right now!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're burned, you've got holes burned into your armor and into your shoulder, and it's still stinging.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are you okay, Tarvis?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, you know, I need a word with my good friend, Obby. Just a quick chat. Would you mind waiting here for one second? Will you keep your finger on the button?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is the acid still going?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, it was about a ten second pee of acid from the holes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I make my way up to Obby, hopscotching over the puddles of acid that I can see?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, yeah you can hear under your shoe is going (sizzling).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Obby, hey, Obby.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry, I panicked.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You did panic.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know why they call me Obby the Rat?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Rats survive.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Who hugs Obby when Obby needs to be punished?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is a good question.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll never know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The Raven Queen.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Since you're so eager to make your way through the hall, would you mind leading the way for us, at a good 20-foot distance from the rest of us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Obby will oblige.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So Obby hobbles ahead, shamefacedly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It might be smart, you guys, to keep looking for little tiles, because my grandma's really paranoid.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will do a perception check to see if I see any more tiles.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Five. Well there's lots of tiles, there's tiles from here all over.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As he goes off, I will also check the grounds around him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Better than five!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Eventually, you guys all make it to the end of this tunnel, and Obby, you're the first one there, you notice the same-- no, you don't know what it is, you point this out to you, Tarvis. Same little circular shrew symbol, about three feet off the ground, in a heavy wooden door.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know, Obby, before they get here, it was opened earlier by Devan cutting her hand really really deeply.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I cut my hand.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Going to do anything with it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I cut my hand and put it there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Your hand slowly dribbles out on the door. You feel a little dizzy. Hungry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I meant to tell you, she cut it a couple times.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The others catch up with you. You see the dwarf shoving his hand on it, and you know that's not going to work.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Obby, that only works with people that are related to her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have a vast lineage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well then keep trying!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does it work?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, but you could keep trying all day, maybe it'll collect.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Try cutting the other hand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I loosen up the cut that I already dug in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's all you need to do is get your hand open.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's taking longer for you. It's taking like 20 or 30 seconds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit. It might not work.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're a weak-ass punk, is the thing. But eventually (clicking).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey! See?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nicely done. Very useful.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here to help!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So should we go in?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Does the door open?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You open it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will try.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I'll cast Mage Hand again and push against it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're looking in at some sort of cool, dry cellar. It's not that bright in here, but the light that's coming from off to the side here lets you see that there are shelves lining all the walls. You see a lot of wooden boxes stacked next to each other, something like 20 of them against the wall, and in the middle of the room, which you can see mostly from where you're standing, are three pallets in a row of similar wooden crates, but the ones on the pallets are wedged together very tightly, very orderly, all in a row for storage of some kind.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Well, looks like we've got a storage room, I'm not sure if it's wine, there's boxes along the wall, and there's three in the center. But they're rather purposefully--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does this look familiar to you at all?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, it does not.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it doesn't. I don't think I've ever been down in this room before, but we've got to be close to the basement!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we looking for the basement?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well that's where she keeps a lot of her treasure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In the basement?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I insight check Devan?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh man, this is one of those instances where I'm going to homebrew it, because I don't know what the rule is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I roll against it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, sure you do.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: That's it. Yeah, no chat room so it doesn't matter!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Also, don't tweet me because I don't care.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I rolled a six!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A six, okay. She seems nervous as fuck, but she's not artfully carrying off any lie that you can tell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's nervous because Obby is so attractive.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm nervous because Obby is so attractive.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm squeezing the number one out of my moustache.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ew. So foul!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If we hear any rumblings of trouble, hide. Fair enough?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Believe me, if anything starts happening here, you should hide, because her magic is really powerful.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's your relationship with her, by the way? Good terms, bad terms?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Terrible.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What did you do? Was it a boy?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So you know, this thing-- have you heard of gambling?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, I know gambling!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it's really fun, right?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dren, Dren.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh yeah, sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's all.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: How much?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know! She has a big room of gold, I just took some of it. I really don't know.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Could we take some gold too?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what I mean! But she might keep the emerald down there.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Do you remember which room that was?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it's in the basement.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: The room of gold is in the basement?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Uh-huh!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You have pockets?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If we find a room of gold, you can fill your pockets.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Thanks, Tarvis.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No worries.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Can I check for traps in this room as we enter?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're entering?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, as you step in, you see where the light is coming from. There is a small, little writing desk in the corner, and there's a little globe, very similar to your dancing lights, floating above the desk. The desk is too small for the bigger folk in this group, but it's about the right size for a halfling. Just a couple papers scattered on it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh! Can I go over and look at them?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Do you want me to check for traps, first?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, well, whatever you roll.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: 18, perception. So 18, 19, 20, 24!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Seems okay.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Dren.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: You go check out that table.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sure! Yeah.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: You, stay behind me.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Stay behind, prisoner. I go over to the table. Do I need to make a check or anything, or can I--?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can, or I could just tell you what you see?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, just tell me what I see. What's Dungeons & Dragons?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Where's the dragon? Is this a dungeon?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's a couple of pieces of paper on the desk. There's a letter made out to a cousin about a wedding. There's another letter about a disagreement over the price of fabric.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: These are boring so far.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Do you see a log book?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do I see a log book?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just a couple pieces of paper.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is there a drawer in the writing desk at all?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There is.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I open it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I open it.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: (explosion)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Roll for initiative.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There are more pieces of paper in there, and you find bills of sale, and amounts of coin changing hands. Records of hers. You see the names of a couple of money lenders listed in Emon, that you're familiar with. You randomly pull a contract for surveillance of General Krieg Tristan. That's a name that raises your eyebrows. Everyone in Emon knows him. That's it. It's a lot of business transactions, but you can't really make out what or who. I mean, not what, you can tell what's being changed hands for the most part, but who knows who bought, who knows who sold.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And there's nothing, like, hidden or tricksy?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's not going to work, but here we go! One!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, we're halfling!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: eight!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Your perception's zero?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is the one that got me killed, so I don't know if you want to roll that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So we're going to replace this guy with a new one!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There is no one more jinxy than Laura. No one more superstitious.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ooh! This is the pretty one. I'll use this one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that got someone else killed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no, it didn't.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She runs up her dice more than a professional athlete, it's crazy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tarvis, you also notice there's a couple pieces of paper also lying helter-skelter on top of the pallets as well. There's papers all over this room.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I collect all of it and I bring it to Tarvis.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are there any records, or binders, ledgers, things like that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "Whisperer" appears several times. You see on a bill of sales Adelaide's signature, and then next to it is the word "overbite," but you don't know what it means. But it seems to have some sort of pattern.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Does it make any sense to you, Tarvis?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not sure yet. Do I recognize any code or a cipher in the writing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Make a straight-up intelligence check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's like carpets being sold, some weapons being sold. A loan.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Can I investigate the boxes on the wall?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure. Make an investigation check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, are we doing this? I want to investigate them too!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dren, stay with her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to look for exits and entrances to the room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, you see a door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seven! We suck.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The walls are really shitty down here, and not smoothed out or pretty. It's a rough room. But there is a door straight across from where you entered.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's another? Not the one we came in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes. Another door.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: So we did an eight and a seven on perception, investigating those boxes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's a lot of really boring paperwork here, listing a lot of sales. Though you did find a piece of paper that describes the sale of a wyrmling dragon. That's cool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's pretty cool.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I like dragons.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I found a piece of paper with codes on it, like Maverick, Goose, Hollywood.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wolfman?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't make it out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Slider?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is true.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sundown?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Do you feel the need for anything?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I start heading towards the exit of the room.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Excuse me, dear.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, excuse me, you can't go by yourself! I'm in charge of you, get behind me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sorry, guys, she--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I do have rope if she gets out of hand, we could--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We'll need it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just make sure I can still use my hands.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Well, we could put it around your neck.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That means we'll kill you. If you get out of line.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Would just make it easier.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: She's funny. Should we go to the next room?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We will go to the door, and we will see if it's locked.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, you grab it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Obby.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Obby just grabs it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Obby the Rat can break any lock.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: This I have heard.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will check the doorknob.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so you rattle it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, checking for traps? All right, make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This shit is clear. You are golden.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're good. I open the door.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. It's wide open. There's a set of stairs that winds away and goes up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is it lit by light or torch?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just from the light that's spilling out of the room you're in. So it's dim, but you can see fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just leads to a stairway?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wood? Brick?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wood.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we hear anything up the stairs? Dren, you're up. Be as tiny as you can be, and sneak up those stairs and see what you can see.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 12, okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, you're cursing all of them, Laura!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sneaky little halfling skitters up the stairs. There's another door at the top.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Guys, there's an-- oh, thank you. I don't know how to say this stealthed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, they're down around a curve, so you're doing that to no one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's a fox bat flying?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I crawl over, and I go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. I motion for everyone to go up the stairs.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I follow in the rear with my rapier. I pull out a dagger as well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Poke, poke, poke, poke. Okay, everyone files up the stairs.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, I just realized we're trying to go to the basement, but we're going up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why are we going-- sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're going up. And there's a door standing in front of you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We had nowhere else to go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait a minute.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yeah. Was that the only door to get out of that room?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did we check for hidden doors or passages?

lines.name: SAM, MARY
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well you checked for traps.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I did.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You didn't see any doors.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: There's nothing behind any of those boxes or anything or under the pallets in the center of the room?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: All right. Wait. Before we go, hold on, come back. Tarvis, get with me and let's push these pallets in the middle of the room.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. There's three of them.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: There's three of them. They're probably very heavy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's take the one on the left. And we'll push it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (sliding) Nothing.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Center.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (sliding) A dead rat breaks open and smears on the floor--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not related.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The one on the right.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I thought you had a vast lineage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That one I know particularly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There is nothing under these pallets.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Can I check behind the boxes on the wall?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, you may. So in the interest of time, you spend three or four minutes, push push push, lots of paper. Nothing you find that's hidden.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There was nothing on the desk? No switches, no--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is a storage room! The rest of her stuff is in the house!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought you've never been in this room.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: But you said it was in the dungeon, or the basement.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, this is not the basement! This is a storage room!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, as we go back up towards the stairs, can we check the walls for any secrets?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In the room or in the stairway?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Up the stairway.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, it's a well-made staircase.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Great, Dren, will you check that door at the top of the stairs for traps?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes, boss. I go and I try the door.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, you just open it?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, my perception's shit. Should I just do it? Okay I'll do it. Seven.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Seven, okay. Yeah. It's good.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Cool, I open it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, it goes (creaking) and opens.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's a good door noise.

lines.name: MARY, SAM
lines.text: Or a cat?

lines.name: LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: (meowing)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You see not much. You still have your lights going?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thick, wooden chests. Solid. Locks on some of them, not all of them, but neatly done in little aisles. Each one about two feet tall. Big, thick bastards. You recognize this room, peering through. This is where you used to skim from grandma's stores. Although you're a little confused because there's only one door to this room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait. This is the only door in?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: The door that we just came through is the only door?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're disoriented. This is not how you're used to entering it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where's the other way?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: What other way?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You recognize this room?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well yeah! This is the basement.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Excellent. Delweth, Dren, go with her and explore.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: All right. I check for traps.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, Devan's globes of light are floating lazily around the room, close to you. And again the shadows are shifting, moving slowly. But you have enough light to see. You walk along one of the aisles and look around. You don't see anything. Nothing in the ceiling, nothing in the floor. The chests look normal.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Devan, do you know what's in any of these?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Gold!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's just gold!?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think so!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I open the nearest chest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You open the nearest chest?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You open it up. There is a fuck-ton of gold coin in this chest beyond counting.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I go to them and say: do not touch that gold.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Tarvis said I could!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I'm going to check it for traps. What am I doing, perception? Ten.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, there's no trap on the chest that she just opened. Seems okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, Dren, you can stick your hand in and get--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Oh, such a bad idea. Stick a knife in or something first so it's not your hand.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who can check for magic?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What's the difference between perception and investigation?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Perception is seeing and spotting things, hearing things. Investigation is looking at stuff left behind and going how does that connect to that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want me to grab some gold to show you it's fine? We're not here for the gold, but sure. And I pick up some gold.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that was bad. It's not on alarm.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A dragon appears.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, that's why it's called Dungeons & Dragons!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But as you dig your hand into this gold and pull and up and coins fall away, you notice out of the corner of your eye, the chest next to it swell, bulge, open, and a mouth bigger than you've ever seen (horrible screeching noise).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I knew there were more than before!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Lunges to bite you. And does, in fact, get you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no! Can't I dodge out of the way? Can't I dodge out of the way?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everybody roll for initiative.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ah shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, hold on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no! Oh no!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You reroll it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh, I don't even want to roll that one again.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That was so close! Oh my god!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was so close!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Here we go! We got a map!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have a map!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: What! It's the first map! (cheering)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Liam, it's not in 3D, it's not color-coded.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where are the fucking trees?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's no atmospheric mist, come on, man.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: You didn't find twelve mini chests to put up there? I mean, come on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay so, this big, massive chest opens its mouth and you see one big, fat eyeball in the back of its misshapen mouth. (growls) And it clamps down on your hand full of gold, and you take eight points--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god! That's a lot!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did I get it right? Yes. Eight points of piercing damage. And then also you take one point of acid damage as its slobber drizzles all over your arm and it latches down. And you feel what feels like crazy glue seep all around your arm and you yank. "Oh shit," you think. Okay, everybody give me your initiatives please.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: 16 for Dren.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: 19 for Delweth.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nine for Tarvis.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, Obby the Rat, you are up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I stealthily flank it using Devan as a distraction and I will sneak attack it with a dagger.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, you're coming around the side, you're saying? Over here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, which one is it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is you, this is it right here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'll go straight from where I am.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Straight at it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, from the side.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, all right. Roll to attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope. 11.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. You lunge forward with your dagger and it melts a little out of the way, seeing you coming. Devan, you are up, and you are grappled, you are in this thing's mouth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With my bonus action, I still have some movement, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have plenty of movement.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will disengage and hop over that chest so I'm more behind it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Right there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. All right, Devan, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With my hand stuck in it, I set my hands on fire and cast Burning Hands.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Holy shit! Yes you do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Aptly named spell.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, 3d6, okay and what's your DC?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a good question.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But there's no dex save because your hand's in its mouth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just roll?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just roll for damage. Roll your 3d6.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh come on! Oh wait, can I reroll ones? On the damage, no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You do have that--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't want to use a sorcery point yet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so what'd you get?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Four on 3d6. Two ones and a two. Like the worst.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so your hand is stuck in there and out of rage you feel the fire charge up in your hand and you go (fire noise) and it goes (small explosion noise).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it let go of me?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Delweth, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh wait! Ugh!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You get a bonus action.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can go.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You do have a bonus action.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Get it, girl.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know. Ugh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Want to use your bonus action to call for Dren?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I'm good.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, we're fine.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: How many feet away am I from the chest of death?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're on to us.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: What I want to do is run, take a flying leap off that first chest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can do that.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: And fly up, and do I have enough momentum to go over the chest that is holding her?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, make an acrobatics check.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I don't know. I'm asking!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Could I have tried to wiggle free? Could I have tried to break the grapple with my turn? Is that possible? Should I have tried to break the grapple?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 24. (swoosh) You are out of movement. You don't clear it, but you land on top of the chest next to it.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I take my rapier and I stab straight down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, roll to attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ah, my hand!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, don't skewer Devan's hand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She doesn't care. She wouldn't care if she did.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Three. Six.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah! It goes (growls). Okay, and now we're on to Dren.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Can I bonus action?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I'd like to disengage and--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, you're out of movement.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I'm out of movement.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that flip cost you a lot of movement.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: All right, I'm going to stand tall and proud on this chest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, by the way, it's on fire now. It ignites anything on fire.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, cool.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I assume I'm not hidden.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: The chest knows where I am.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And I can't move into a position that I am hidden from him?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You could.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You could dance around the back of him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But again, since we've got so many rogues, I'll remind you to get your sneak attack damage you don't need to be hidden. If one of your friends is on it, you get the same from that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, so I can do sneak attack right now?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can do it right now, yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to do a sneak attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, go for it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Or can I try to get Devan free? Is there any way for me to do that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can cut her hand off?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll sneak attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If you want to try to pry its mouth open or something you could. Oh, also Delweth, your sword sticks, it doesn't come out.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to try to kill this thing with my shortsword, sneak attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Can you help me with this?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah totally, you roll. Roll a 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's good! Plus six, so 20 is the attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, that hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So d6 plus four.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And then sneak attack, I do an additional 2d6?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, roll the initial attack first. Do your damage without it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, eight, and then two more d6.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Four and five.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 13. Nice.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sweet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Guys, we're playing Dungeons & Dragons just like on Stranger Things!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Demogorgon!

lines.name: LIAM
