lines.text: Yeah, like a ring written in a circle. You tug the rug back a bit and you see it goes further under the carpet and you see the edge of a spiral pattern of writing that you can't--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Is it Elvish?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was going to ask.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's not.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, it's not?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Dwarvish?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Orcish?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Make an arcana check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is Esperanto.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can jump on things and unlock things.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: All right, we will start walking very slowly. Can I do a perception check for any traps down this hallway? Or is it all sort of fucked anyway?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a long hallway and there's so much shit in here that it's like process a little bit as you go.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: All right, let's take it real slow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What if you do an arcana check?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Can I do an arcana check on the scrawl?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Forget about it. That's 18 plus, what do I add? 18 plus three, that's 21.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, you know what this is.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Of course I do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How do you think you know magic? You had to study.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yeah! I know what this is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You don't know all of it. You would never be able to make this on your own, but you recognize some of the key glyphs in it. This is a magic sigil. This will turn gravity haywire here. You look straight up at one of the iron, gothic, tooth-like chandeliers, right above it.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Right. Do not step here. From what I can see, if you do, you'll be thrown up into the ceiling, into the teeth of this fantastic chandelier. So, my recommendation would be to go around.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If we cross this threshold or if we step here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are there any wall sconces up top?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are there?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. There is enough room on the sides to gingerly step around this.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: You're in the lead. I'm behind you. I hold you with my left hand and I have my rapier in my right. We start to move very slowly on exposed wood that we can see whether or not there's going to be any--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So what are you saying, someone's pulling carpet as you go or? It's one carpet that goes all the way down the hall and Tarvis went and under this part of the carpet was one area.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're avoiding the carpet altogether.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: We can't because it's wall to wall, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's not wall to wall. It's a very wide hall and it's down the center and all the eclectic craziness is piled up to the sides of it. I mean some stuff spills over on the rug, but it's pretty hodge podge.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Were there windows that were along the wall?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No windows up here.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: So we make our way down the right side on the wood.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can't do that because the wood all the way down is taken up by things like jars with pickled unicorns in them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But we can avoid the gravity scrawl--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This one spot you can sneak around.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: All right, we'll sneak around that and slowly work our way forward.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Keeping an eye on the ground for any more of those things.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. You pass by a portrait of a woman all in black, stiff, austere dress, a cold white face, and you double take and look at it again and realise that that woman is dead and there's a fly crawling in the side of her mouth. On the other side there's a painting of a large still lake stretching away from the shore and there's a small boat drifting off in the middle. And there's a piece of fabric draped into the water and things floating in the side of it.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Grandmother had a very strange definition of fun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think she might be into some creepy shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is the dead woman behind a case or is she out, the dead woman?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a painting. You see an assortment of bells covering the top of one table, all different sizes and different colors of metal. A platter with a series of bone needles lying on it. You see a stuffed ostrich with a little skull cap metal pith helmet with a spike coming out of it. On one armoire, there's a shiny black stone wasp as big as a bird, also gorgeous. A wicker rabbit with antlers protruding from its head.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: A wabbit with antlers.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes. Arcane jackalope.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tarvis has told me to pick up the wasp.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't pick up anything! Don't touch anything!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pick up the wasp?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seriously.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Make a con save.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well you don't have to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is done. Make a con save my friend.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well you pick it up and look at it and it is gorgeous and shines. It glints in the light. It curls in on itself and the stinger goes into your wrist. You take two points of damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What kind?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Poison.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I am a dwarf, advantage on saves versus poison, resistance against poison damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Resistant, nice! You take one point and you have a small red hole bleeding out in your hand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I suck the poison out. I swallow it down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You are hard as nails, Obby the Rat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Through all of this have we seen a wall sconce?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're still walking down the hall. What's our order, by the way?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Devan's first, I'm second.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Devan's first.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm third, Dren's fourth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's also enough room to go side by side, which is--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: No, I know, but I'm pushing her forward.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everyone going single-file, yeah? Who's third?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I am. And Obby in the rear, like he likes it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So you continue to walk?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Slowly, investigating everything as we go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you looking for traps, further traps?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I use my Mage Hand to push the carpet as we go forward to see if there's anything--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure, but also make a perception check. This is a crowded-- this is not your normal room.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I got a three, so all things I could perceive with a three just go ahead and tell me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I rolled a three as well!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jeez. Fucking turtledoves.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, so you're still walking forward, right?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yep, Mage Handing the carpet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. So as you're walking--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Balls.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Devan (whoosh) is gone.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: She's gone? Tarvis?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Strike! Find her.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Devan?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Devan!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hold that thought. Devan. You are instantly submerged in water. It is pitch black. You can't see anything. You are underwater. Your hands are tied behind your back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You hold your breath. You

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Do I have the end of the rope, that was...? I was holding the rope.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 19? Okay. Whoops, that's the wrong one. You feel small sharp teeth biting on every inch of your body. Your neck, your face, your hands, everywhere, biting through your clothes. You feel a burning sensation under your skin in your blood, and you take five points of poison damage. You can't see what's going on. You kick and start to panic. You can't tell which way is up. You can't tell which way is down. You guys. She's been gone for 30 seconds.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where did she go? Feel the floor around where she was standing.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I don't know. I step forward into where she was.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: No? Is that a bad idea?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You did it.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I did it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nothing happens.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Nothing?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, what are the objects around us that we can see immediately around us?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's an ostrich with a little spike helmet on his head.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One of the paintings was water?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One was a lake.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we see her splashing around in the painting?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 45 seconds have passed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I go to the water painting and start feeling it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's your constitution modifier, Laura?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus six.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I go and splash around in the water. Does anything happen?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What water? There's no water.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Isn't there water? Oh, in the painting.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm looking at the painting to see if there's anything.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Nothing.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I pull the painting off the wall and stick my dagger into it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You pull the painting off the wall and see a scrawl of arcane glyphs in a circle, there. No, it's right parallel to where Devan was.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Okay. All right, glyphs, perception check on the glyphs? Arcane check, arcana?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, arcana check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I do anything?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Natural one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are short-circuiting. You're so discombobulated by this scenario--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to die!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I come up behind her because she's made this discovery, I try one as well.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Tarvis, Tarvis!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow! You're just destined to die! That's two in a row!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just around this scrawl of arcana on the wall, going gabba, gabba gabba gabba.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Four.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is this? 13.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 13. You don't know what the fuck that says.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know what it says. I reach my arm into it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've already passed a set of doors behind you, and then there's another two, and another two all the way at the end of the hall. And at the end of the hall, on the right, behind the closed door, you hear (impact).

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I run toward that door.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I go with her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, you two are bolting down the red carpet. They all have the same turn-latch door handle that the original doors do, and you get to the door and freeze for a second?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I open it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As soon as you touch the door handle, electricity goes up your arm.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All the traps have been sprung.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just all of them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucking fun room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dexterity save on that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, five, and then I do this guy?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tarvis. We can let Devan die.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You take only five points of electricity damage. So you've just been electrocuted by the door handle, but the door does open, and you hold your hand. You look in. The room is somewhat lit from the lights behind you, and you see a large 20-feet-tall cube of glass, a fish tank, and inside it, you can see a form going--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I start smashing it with my shortsword.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Everybody roll initiative.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 19 as well!

lines.name: ASHLEY, LAURA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 20, okay. What about you, gentlemen?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Seven. Leading from the front. Haven't hit shit yet. Not one thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. All right, so Devan, the fish continue to bite.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I do anything?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In a second, you can.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Do they bite the rope, and they eat the rope? The fishes? They don't know what's flesh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Make another con save.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You are dead. You're a dead person.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, take eight more points of poison damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seriously?!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, Delweth, you are up. You guys are here. This is so stupid. There's a fish tank in here you guys are looking at.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Draw a fish tank.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Delweth, you're up, what would you like to do?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I would like to try some acid against the fish tank.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Roll 1d6.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's the cube.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Three.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. It seems to be very thick. And now it is Dren's turn.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: If you want to be sneaky-sneaky, we can see the corner of your--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I assassinate the fish tank? Is this the top of the fight? I'm going to attack it with my shortsword.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. It's 18.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure, hit the shit out of that fish tank.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is it a sneak attack?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Damn it. Okay. It is ten.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ten, okay. Devan, you may try to do something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to cast Chromatic Orb.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With what verbal command?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well then, I'm going to use one of my sorcerer points to do a subtle thing, because I can do it without any verbal components.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good, well done.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to cast Chromatic Orb as a thunder attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What about the hand motions, though? That's what one of the other ones is. I see V, S, M next to Chromatic Orb. Verbal... I forget what they stand for. But one is-- components? One is verbal and then one is doing this stuff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I try for a movement to wiggle my hands out, because it's kind of loose?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can make a dexterity check at disadvantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, shit, balls. What was the first one? Was it a ten? 11.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come on!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tarvis, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, no, I still get to do something!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to try and swim forward and start kicking against the glass.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You swim your way-- some light has shined through once that door opened out there, although you can't really tell why. The light's coming. You swim towards light. You get over there. Tarvis, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take the scimitar and try and hit the non-moving, non-armed fish tank. Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Roll. Don't roll a one.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Did you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's an eight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, you hit it, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yay! Seven.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. The glass goes (glass cracking). It holds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Technically, did I have to waste a sorcerer point for that, since I couldn't actually do the spell?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. Okay, Rat, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did we all run down to the thing? I was futzing with the art.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You were. So you're there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I get there?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Actually nobody should have gotten there, but it's okay.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: It's all right, through the magic--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What would you like to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm in the room?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, you're not, because you were futzing with the painting. So we'll say you were the last one in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then I say: why is everyone in here? Oh!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, we're now back-- no we're not.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Make a constitution save.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Take a big breath in. Everybody?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, drowny girl.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ten is not going to do it. Three points of poison damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She dead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not yet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, now we're at the top. Delweth.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Right. Since Poison Spray won't do anything, I'm going to take my rapier and stab it into the biggest part of the crack, where the acid is, and the crack meet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Roll to attack. I'm sure you'll hit it.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: 13 plus whatever.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: It hits? All right.

lines.name: LAURA, ASHLEY
lines.text: It's a box.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's got a very low armor class.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Seven. Plus three. Ten.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so you run up with your thin little sword and go, "Ugh! Oh fuck this," and you turn it around and go (impact) into the side of the glass (glass cracking) and a little bit of water starts spilling out near the bottom. Devan-- no, Dren--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: And I don't get a bonus action to do anything else?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You do. Sure, if you have an idea, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Disengage.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I hide from the spray of water! Because it could be poison. I back up three feet.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to attack it again with my shortsword.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, yes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I hit it. And I'm going to do one of these guys. Nine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. A piece breaks out and water starts spilling out. It's very tall. Tarvis, it's your turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh sorry, Devan's turn, Devan's turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I try to get my hands free again?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes. Make a dex save.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At disadvantage. Come on! Five. Okay, I kick at the crack. Can I at least kick at the crack?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You spent your whole action going-- So you get a bonus action.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sucks. I can't--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can she swim to the hole and try to get a breath?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Is there any air that's come out now that the water's come down?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It hasn't reached that spot yet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a cube, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a verbal, so I would use a sorcery point.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. There's a big (splash) as water slaps together, and a drenched, coughing, pale-skinned, veins going down her neck Devan appears on the ground, between you and you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Devan! Can I untie her, please?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. I turn towards the glass tank and I hit it with the scimitar.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, you also take your hilt and (glass breaking).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's lying on the ground, right? The water's hitting her?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, all over her. Fish are hitting the ground, flapping around on the ground.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I walk over to her. I stand right over her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought you'd been here before? You didn't know that was going to happen?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You've actually never been in this room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've never been in this room.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: You were in the hallway, though, before.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. And I told you guys to look for a wall sconce, and then you marched me down the hallway.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Let's do it again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: All right. Anything else in this room?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In this room?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Have a look around if you'd like.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I'd like to look around the room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Perception check, please.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I'll roll this die. It's a-- That would be 18.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, you perception all the slowly dying beautiful but poisonous fish in here and look around, the room is empty except for this fucking thing. You don't see anything else.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Right, there's nothing else, let's go.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I stealthily give Devan one of my potions?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Roll and I'll tell you if you can.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Gulp, gulp, gulp.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, you mean, feed it to her.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh yeah, sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does nobody notice this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So what happens is Dren crouches down and slowly pours it in, and then when she feels like someone's looked she goes (slaps) across the face.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ow!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: How much damage does she take from the slap?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Never again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now you're getting the idea, Dren.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How much does she get back?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, it's all on your character sheets. It depends on which one you gave her. You guys have one superior and two greater.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I give you greater.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The big hitter is 8d4 plus eight. The two smaller are 4d4--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I roll or does she roll?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Doesn't matter.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: (singing) Every night in my dreams--

lines.name: TRAVIS, MARY
lines.text: (singing) I see you--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's great!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why did we come in this room again?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: We had to, to save her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I mean the magic room. Why are we here? There's no big jewel here. We're here for jewel.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's a door that opens if you do the right things, and there's--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're not doing them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And Devan, you've never been in the room you're in. But looking out the door of the room you're in, you see, across the hall, a circular "siggle."

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: "Siggle?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's there!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The room!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The room?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jesus, Tarvis!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: His first name isn't Jesus.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, she needs to put her-- with the blood, with the thing, on the thing!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, she doesn't need to do that. I walk up and I cut her upper arm and get a bunch of blood on my hand. And I walk over to the "siggle" and place it on the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's really a sigil, it's not actually a "siggle."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well now you're making-- I'm confused.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So you hold your hand there, and blood, someone else's blood smears on. You wait, and you wait, and that ain't doing shit.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I feel like we need to let her use her hand.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I lift her up. How high up is it from the floor?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I really don't understand why you don't want me to have my hands. What are you afraid I'm going to do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Three feet.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Three feet. I lift her up, march her over, I turn her around, I slit her hand, and I push her up against it, hands still tied.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you cast the spell?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think it works if I'm not free.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Try.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm trying. I can't get my hand on there right.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I thought it was just blood and hands.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look, I can't get my hand on there right. I can't twist it around.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: She can't get her hand on there right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I push in a little. Try harder.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) I'm trying real hard.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Guys, just for a second--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dren, shut up. Try harder.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Now would be a good time for a haiku.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I have a haiku?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You can do it, my dear friend, Devan Bluebutton. Please don't die now, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So inspiring.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel inspired. I didn't know you thought I was your friend, that's great!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm trying. I'm trying.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can cast that cantrip. Okay, so it takes a little bit of time, 20-30 seconds, held up, hoisted in the air by an elf assassin, with your hand bleeding out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seriously, while this is happening, you guys, I don't understand why you think I need to think I have my hands tied.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't understand why you're still talking.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You guys are the sneaky ones. I'm just here to help. I'm just here to help!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Click!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: See how well that worked? Patience is key, right? Patience.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Door opens? What do we see?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You guys cased this joint from the outside. There is a bit of a tower on this side of it. This has got to be that. Four of those golden orbs are hanging and lighting up this room. You look up. It goes very high. You can see down here and it gets darker and darker the higher you go. You can't see the peak. Across from where you entered, made out of the same metal, is a pair of flat doors with the same circle printed into the metal. Like a cabinet, directly across.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No furniture or anything in the room?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nothing in here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is the floor made of?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The floor is also metal. In the center of the room is a smaller circle that's about a foot and a half wide, and it's got a spiraling out flower shape.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, we found your room. What happens in here? I don't see a gem.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't see anything. I'm facing the wrong direction.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I turn you around.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's the room that she took you to. This is room where your grandmother showed you how to create illusions and how to pull moisture from the air to create shards of ice and use them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sounds like a pretty special woman. I think you should be grateful to have a grandmother like her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) I think she would like you a lot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Family is very important.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: So what do we do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know. There's another rat over there.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: What's in this room? What's in the center of the room? What is it? That circular, beautiful, spiraling outward, floral thing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: You never used it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'd like to insight check her. Does she know?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Roll for insight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to call it for her. She appears flustered and a bit of a doofus, but she seems like she's telling the truth.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The circle in the middle of the room is a foot and a half wide? How big was the brass column?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A foot and a half wide

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: (yelling) What? (whispering) Go investigate it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to go take a look at that without standing on top of it or touching the flowery stuff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: While he's doing that, can I message Dren?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure, hold that thought.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 14. Not too great.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you willing to touch it at all?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, looking for any signs that it could open or be a door. Hinges.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's not like an etching, like that circular sigil of a shrew over there. It does seem to be made out of more than one piece. It's not a decoration, but that's all you can tell.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: What do you see?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Something's under it. I don't know what, though.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's your formation in here, by the way?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's at the circle in the middle.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I'm behind Devan, still holding onto the rope and my rapier. Oh, hello.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who's where?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're in the doorway, right?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: We just took a few steps in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm halfway from Obby to the door.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who's got the gambling addict?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I do. She's in front of me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where are you, Dren?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think I'm just behind.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Want to Mage Hand it? Want me to touch it? What do you want? Want me to push down on it, see what it can do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well if it's a monster, that would be bad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to message Dren, and say, I think the jewel is in the cabinet on the other side of the room.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's in the other room. It's in the cabinet?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: On the other side of the room. Just remember--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The cabinet doors are right here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: These guys are tough. I think worst case scenario, we should get it and go.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How are we going to get past them?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't even know!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We need to get you down first.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Loosen the ropes. See if you can loosen my ropes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to do a stealth. Try to do a sleight of hand, is that what that was, to loosen her ropes?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dexterity check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Dexterity?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know that she is holding onto the ropes.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But you can still make a sleight of hand check.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Give it a shot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, sleight of hand, yes, sleight of hand.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sleight of hand?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: While she's holding it? Jeez.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Why not! I'm brazen.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: At disadvantage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: At disadvantage?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that was a good one. So roll it again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Got to roll it again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And take the lower. They were the same!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Were they?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! They were both 16.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I thought one of them was six.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No no no no, they were both 16.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: They were both 16. Okay, so then 19.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to say, Delweth, you were staring up, trying to assess what was happening up top.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: The shiny ceiling?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You get her hands free.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: At that moment, all of you hear the sound of some sort of clank, very high, high above you. And behind you, Dren, all of you, but you especially, hear (metal slamming).

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Oh, balls.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You guys are in here. And that's when you hear, not in your ears, at the base of your skull, inside your skull, "Not supposed to be here."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that your grandmother?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If it is, her voice has changed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: "Dogs, dogs, dogs."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dogs! Dogs! Shit!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And then you hear, way high, at the apex of this tower, a chime. "Ding."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Guys?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (multiple fwooshing sounds)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Five?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Puffs of sparkling white and purple smoke (fwoosh) to one side, to the other side, around you suddenly. You're looking at four smoking, misty, almost-hairless dogs. Angry looking, slobbering. Three of a certain size, one much larger, staring at you with glassy, milky white eyes. It's big, it's muscular, it's ropey. And they bare their teeth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I cast Minor Illusion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of my grandmother.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In front of me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Roll for initiative, everybody.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hold that thought, everybody. 13 is what you rolled, Dren? Okay.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I did as well, 13.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 16, okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (snickers)

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Do you know why?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Roll initiative for me, too, Devan.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 18. All right. Then you are the first one to go. Ooh, doo-loo-loo-loo! Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dogs all rolled 20s.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You start to move your hands. The dogs lunge in on all of you. The first one-- Oh hey, this music's too chill.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) I need more tension! (music intensifies)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There is it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This dog comes running toward you, and bites into your arm, maybe?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My arm?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who, who's that, who's biting?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's your AC?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 11? Yes. Its teeth sink into your arm as you start to cast and you take, oh, just two points of damage. And the spell is gone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What spell? I didn't get to cast anything.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: You did. The Minor Illusion.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This dog rushes, does the same thing for you, Obby. What's your armor class?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You feel teeth sink into your thigh, and you take five points of piercing damage. This dog goes (whoosh noise) and is gone. (whoosh noise) He is right behind you, Delweth, and what's your armor class?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You feel teeth sink into your gut, on the side. You take three points of piercing damage, and the big one (snarling noise) lunges in to attack you, Tarvis, and you feel teeth sink into the back of your calf and take five hit points in piercing damage. Tears away, and you feel part of your calf come away.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aw shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Devan, you may try something else.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Try that again?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to try Minor Illusion. And make it look like my grandma now behind me. In front of me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know if your grandmother qualifies as an object.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, it has to be an object?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Object within range.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Minor Illusion?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A sound or an image of an object. You're right, okay. All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll let you do something else.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, then I'm going to cast Chromatic Orb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, all right. Where's it going?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is your second level one, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. Yes, I'm going to cast Chromatic Orb at the dog that's biting me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm going to do--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Make a ranged spell attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, so I'm going to do it at the big dog attacking Tarvis then.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm going to do it as a thunder attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That probably doesn't hit though. What's my spell?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, man, it's on your sheet. On page number two, it is plus six on ranged attacks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay. So that's what I rolled. Ten.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ten?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Nine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. A ball of crackling energy goes (whoosh noise) misses the dog entirely, goes (impact noise) ricochets like a pinball off the side of the wall and arcs up, and then (impact noise) diffuses high up in the air. You can still move if you want.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, I'm going to back up behind-- who's next to me? Delweth?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Delweth, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to stand behind Delweth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where you going to go? Over here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're going to walk there? Or run there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to dart under her legs.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dart under her legs? Okay, you start to move under. The dog behind you sees you go, and-- what's your armor class?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 11. Yeah, bites into your back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ow!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And you feel part of your robes rip away, and you take five points of piercing damage and you get over here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yikes! All right, I want to like stay under her legs, basically.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Oh, so you're sharing the space with her?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Okay, and now it is Tarvis' turn, what would you like to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I see we have three daggers. Does that mean we can do like the famous rogue, Vax, and dagger dagger dagger?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: No, that's what I asked him when we got here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You need boots of haste and the feat Dual Wielding to do that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take my scimitar with its one trusty hit today.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I swing at White Fang there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, all right, roll to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural 20. Hey, finally! Which means I also get the savage attack crit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, it does.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Savage attack?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Savage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's just savage. That's a three plus three is six. Which means I get an extra damage die, which is a four, for a whopping ten.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it near a thing, do you get a sneaky, sneaky? You get a sneaky?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, from Obby. I mean, this fixes that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 18? You pull out the blade, the curved blade, and it sort of sings as you spin it in the air, and bring it down in a slice, and it cuts into the ribs of this dog. And the dog yelps, loud, and sort of buckles down for a bit. And has murder in its mouth and its blind eyes. What was the total on that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Its blind eyes? It's blind?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Looks like it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, now it is Dren's turn.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I can like call to Devan as like a thing, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can do that, plus your attack roll.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Do you know anything about this sigil in the middle? Is it open?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Got to be six seconds of dialogue, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know anything about it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to fight then. Let's see, is that a dog right next to me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're all dogs.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So that guy is a dog? Okay, okay. So no sneak attack for Dren for that guy, he knows I'm there?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You do have sneak attack on this one.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But also potentially the big guy?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If you throw something, yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: If I do a crossbow?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Or use your crossbow, sure.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I guess I might as well--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Six more seconds to decide it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to attack the guy right next to me actually.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, go for it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. With my shortsword. 15?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ah, yeah, that hits.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. And is that sneak attack?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ah, yes it is. Because of the crowd here.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So that's one, and then eight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Eight? Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: To the dog adjacent to me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Roll plus four. You didn't add that four.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh! Plus four.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So it's 12 total.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Math in my head. All right, great, and that was which weapon? Your shortsword?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: My shortsword.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. You squat down, almost do a little ballerina split, and then stick your sword up into its gut from underneath. And the dog goes (yelp of pain), underneath, and snarls through. And now we're on to-

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do I get a bonus action?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, you do.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to dash behind Tarvis? Can I make it there?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're going to go here?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. Can I get to the other side of him? No?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can do that. You're tiny, too. Yeah, you can get through-- where do you want to go, here?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. I'll say you can do that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because of how small you are and how big he is.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. So you start to run and this dog that you stabbed sees you running, sees your back, and lunges at it. But you're too quick, and it goes (noise of jaws snapping shut) as you slide underneath Tarvis' legs.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Nice. Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Delweth, you are up.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I'm going to try Poison Spray on White Fang.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: What do I do, I roll--?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I do it. What's your spell DC? It's the numbers near the top of your--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fails.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: All right, so what do I do?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: 1d12. Which one's a d12?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This guy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Trusty d12.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Two.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two? Okay.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Plus nothing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Plus nothing. But that noxious odor--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Sneak attack? Sneak attack?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No sneak attack. But it floats into this old blind bastard's face and goes (choking and snarling) and it's blind, but it looks in your direction and snarls. Did you want to do anything else?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I would like to disengage and go hide behind--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hide behind Devan?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I would like to go behind White Fang.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're going over this way?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, as you go this dog, who's biting people's backs today sees you go, and a little tip to all you newer players--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She disengaged, though, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, you disengaged, you're right.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Disengage, motherfucka!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, you go (blip noises). Great, thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, but I was hiding!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you, thank you for that. And now we are on to Obby the Rat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I attack the big dog with a dagger.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I get him. It's a 22.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That hits. And you have sneak attack damage on this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Three.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm even going to say you have advantage on-- well you already hit, though, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Eight. Plus nine. 17.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh my god. You come in low with your knife and stick it in right under one of its legs and then slide all the way down the length of its body. And you see one noodle of intestine go (splurting noise) out the side of it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Want to do anything else?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's still alive?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will use sleight of hand to jam my fucking crowbar, that I recovered from the dude, into the floor to try to open the circle on the floor.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Make a dexterity check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It glances off of this thing. It wasn't a natural 20, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, it was a 13 plus a seven.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It glances off of it. That is the time when, in the back of your brain, you hear (gurgling noises).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Delweth. You, freaking out, look up and see a bulbous, green--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god, we're going to die.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ah shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Something coming down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: We're are all going to die. There's something coming from the ceiling!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (gurgling noises)

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: And it--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's Sylvia Plath.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Sylvia Plath.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And give me one moment please.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I almost said something really mean.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: About Sylvia Plath? What did she ever do to you?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (singing) Sorry, everybody at home. I'm Ashly Burch and that's all for today.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Delweth, I need you to make a constitution save right now.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Oh, balls. All right, 18.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, you guys see a ray of blackish-gray light go (thrumming sound) down from the ceiling and cut along the floor right past you. But you slide back against the wall and it misses you just in time. And now it is time for the dogs.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, not the dogs.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: (screaming)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's your armor class, Dren?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It is 14.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm so sorry, but you take five points of piercing damage as the teeth sink into the bottom of your sword arm. Obby, this dog lunges right at you and you feel it get up under your neck and bite right here at your shoulder. And you take five points of piercing damage--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Better than 16?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's your armor class?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It rolled a 15. Thank you for that. I didn't remember that your armor class was so high. And this one rushes at our half-orc commander, but it's so fucked up and so sad now, it blindly misses you. And now it is Devan's turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to run and try to get to the other side of the room with the doors.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Which way do you want to go? This way? You can scoot under her legs or--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'll scoot under Delweth's legs.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to do this one time. I'm going to remind you that both of these dogs get an opportunity attack. This is the last time I'm going to remind any of you motherfuckers.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know that they will, but I don't really have another option here. If I move, can I make it across to the doors?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's your movement?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You want to go straight across?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'd say you'd make it to about there or there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then I'm going to-- ugh! Burning Hands everything in a 15-foot cone of me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll say you're here, so you could get these two and I'll say you won't get Tarvis.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Lucky.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So they must make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) Living on a prayer!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's your spell DC?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I really don't have it written anywhere on these sheets.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have it. It's 14.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: All the way on the right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have the page! It's a 14! I really have only been looking at these three.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, little guy makes his save, big guy does not, so what's your damage?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okie dokie, here we go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She puts her thumbs together and fans her fingers out, pointing at these dogs.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, 13!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And you have just Sigourney Weavered them, fire spraying from your hands.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Get away from me, you bitches!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sets this dog completely on fire, it screams

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (screaming) Tarvis! Tarvis!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What was the total damage? Was it 14?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 13. Okay. All right. And this one is singed and blackened and one eye is burned away and it looks bad.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: You killed White Fang?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And now it is Tarvis' turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, but can I try to-- no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can do it if you want to try to do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Will I get hit if I move now? There's a little one next to me? I can't see what's next to me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There is one dog next to you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to run away from it. I'm going to run under Gelweth's legs.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This way or this way?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Oh, under Gelweth's legs. Delweth's legs. I don't know why I keep calling her Gelweth, I'm sorry. It's a good name, Gelweth is a great name too.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Gelweth's great. I love it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So Delvy runs, you feel teeth sink into the back of your neck and pull hair and flesh away from the back of your neck for five hit points of piercing damage. You still alive?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You run one, two. I'm going to say you're there. Now it is Tarvis' turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I turn to the little doggie that is engaged with Obby?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Obby the Rat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And go a little scimitar on his punk ass.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (blade slicing)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I do not like dogs or number ones.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Again?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't get to take a potion as my bonus action.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, sure. Which one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just the greater.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So you have got one greater left and one superior left?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, Tarvis. In a rush of friendship and loyalty to your good friend, you do that move that you always finish fights with. You bring it up and you bring it down in a circle and go (grunt) and there's so much blood on your hand that you go (grunt) and the blade flies out of your hand across the room and clatters down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Clang-a-lang-lang-lang-lang.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't worry, it's all part of the plan.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would you like to move at all?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would like to

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To Dren? On the other side of Dren?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, behind Dren.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ooh, you're dead. Here?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, and now we're onto Delweth. All these fucking 'D' names.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: 'D' names, so many 'D' names. How many dogs are left?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Three.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I want to cast Sleep on them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, nice. You can cast it on all of them?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yeah, I think. The spell sends creatures into a magical slumber, roll 5d8, right?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yeah, creatures within 20 feet of a point you choose--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's everybody within a 20-foot area.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Everybody

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everybody.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I can't be specific as to who, what, and the where now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Big ass slumber party.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are you casting?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Sleep, I was going to cast Sleep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Now, you can slap whoever you want awake afterwards. But it's a 20-foot area.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can also aim it straight up in the air.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I can. All right, I'm going to aim it straight up at that thing. I don't know what that is. I can't do a perception check on what the fuck that is? All right, I'm going to cast Sleep on that thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, roll the 5d8.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: The thing, straight up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so you cast and you see the barest shimmer of starlight between you and it, and it surrounds it. Nothing happens.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Is that a fucking beholder?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it's not a beholder. Is it a beholder? It looks like a beholder. A little beeby beholder.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: You said there was another set of doors?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, sort of. Metallic doors. You want to go over there?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yep!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's your movement?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The door is for more monsters to come out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, you're there. Obby, what do you want to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, is the White Fang gone? Obby the Rat would like to kill the dog in front of me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, fuck yeah. This one?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The one on the sigil.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a lot of them. With the handaxe, what is that, 1d6 plus two. Seven. And then--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Roll another one, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, is there sneak attack?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, there's nothing around it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yep, nope.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So just seven, wait--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Roll another six.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ooh, another six. So wait, so five and five plus two?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Each time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Each time plus two? 14.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 14? Okay, and what weapon are you using for that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Handaxe.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Handaxe, okay. You sink this axe right down into its neck. And you feel cutting into the bone of the thing, and it screams. The dog screams, but it writhes and lashes in anger, in a fit. It is still moving.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will try one more time to open door on floor.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's more than a bonus action, I think.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I will not do that. Instead, I will say, Tarvis, do you need potion?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I'll disengage and back away from the dog then.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, you're going this way?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, as far as I can.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (gurgling)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, it's coming down!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, I didn't get to go. Should I have gone?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You didn't go?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I did not go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do I have sneak attack on any of these dudes?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Son of a-- Let's see. I'll attack--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've like scrawled everything so it's like (gibberish).

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to attack the dude that Obby the Rat just attacked?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This one? Sure.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, what are you using?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: My crossbow?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can use a crossbow. Sure.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: There's a dog right next to me, huh.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right behind you, yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I move towards that doggy?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He'll get an attack of opportunity on you, the one next to you, if you move away from it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Unless you disengage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's your bonus action.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: After I attack? I can do it first? Can I disengage first?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And move next to-- is it Alby over there? On the side?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To Alby? Obby is over here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pronounced Obby.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sorry!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can get that far. You bolt over there, run towards the wall, you whip around and turn with your crossbow?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You press your back into the wall and-- this one?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, guy in the middle.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, roll the attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Short for Obenthal.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Or just Oben.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That hits, roll to hit. Roll for damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Seven!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Seven total?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you, Dren.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You're welcome, Alby.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (gargling) You're getting a better look at it. It is like some sort of green, scaly ball with a big fat eyeball out of it with four little stalks--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It is a baby beholder!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And one of the stalks hangs like dead, limp, with a bandage around the eye. But three of them are going like (whooshing).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aw, little buddy got hurt.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (singing) Beholder babies!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In fact, he turns one of his eyes towards you, Devan--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Towards Devan!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Devan, make a--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Death saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Make a constitution save.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, you feel the ray goes (buzzing) right down onto you, you're looking right at it, and your whole body stiffens. (panting) And you shake it away. You're okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Now we're onto "Dogs, dogs, dogs, dogs." This one sees you, Dren, lunges in. Totally bites your face! Eight points.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ah! All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This one goes for the-- you know what? (two puff noises)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Come on!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Totally bites your face for five points of piercing damage. And when I say face, I meant it, it took a piece of your cheek and ear away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why are you being a dick?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mostly skull at this point.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Now it is Devan's turn.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Come on, Dev.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hot blood trailing down your--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pop that potion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to Burning Hands him because that seemed to work so well before.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The dog put all its dog concentration on bamfing out of one place right here and as soon as it got here, it bit you and it went, "Surprise motherfucker!" (whooshing)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ten!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (panting) And I'm going to run forward toward the doors! And while I'm running, I'm going to bust out my other-- oh wait, if I get to the door can I bonus action it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to take another potion!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Gurgle, gurgle, gurgle, gurgle. All right, Tarvis, you are up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With my 30 speed, can I go to the last D-O-G?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I will take my whip!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: What! Take your whip?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (shouting) What the fuck! (shouting)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're so angry--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Each one of those has been with a different dice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two points of slashing damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Why is he our leader? (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dren, you're up!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay! I'm going to, first things first, take a potion.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Dren just went!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I missed her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We all missed her, really.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: We missed her so much.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Thanks, guys. 11?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, nice. Plus four.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Plus four's 15!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: For your hit points? Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. All right. Back of the net! Okay, so now, I'm going to fuck up that dog right next to me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So that is a 20.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that hits.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's not a sneak attack probably, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is a sneak attack.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, it is?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because Tarvis is right here.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Aw shit, son. All right, that's a nine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here comes the general!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So that's nine. 19!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Which weapon did you use?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Shortsword.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shortsword? Okay, you feel bad for your higher-up here, and as conflicted as you are in the situation, as as many things are going on, you still trained a long time; you are Clasp. You take your blade, and you bring it up, and you swing it, and you're so short you push up, and it's the smallest dog in the group, and you spear it like a shish kabob. And blood and guts spills down over your hands, and it slumps down to the ground.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Has Dren killed everyone tonight?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice job, Dren.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I killed two things. Halflings.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Halflings. Woop woop.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (gurgling)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh right, that guy.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I turn around and I look at the doors. And I use Mage Hand to try and open them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The hand pries and walks around like a little spider, pulls and pulls, and it's the saddest little thing, and it turns around and goes.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I'm useless. Is that my action?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It still exists. Your hand is still there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh, you could bitch-slap the baby beholder.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: All right, I'm going to bitch-slap the little beholder.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Your hand starts floating in that direction, I'll say.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I'll take Devan and put her right in front of me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nah.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: She's right next to me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, but you did some stuff already. You already cast a spell.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Then I'm going to hide behind Devan. That's my bonus action.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can't, I'm a halfling. You can't hide behind me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know what you do? You kick the ground in anger and go, "Aww." And now it is--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I can't go behind Devan?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nope, she's pressed against the wall. She's right up against the wall. You'll get yours. Obby, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Obby the Rat moves to center of room, says thank you to Dren for killing all dogs.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Welcome.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I give haiku to Dren. I say: I'm Obby the Rat, you know why they call me that? 'Cause I hate haiku.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That was a really good haiku.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You didn't even have to rhyme, but you still did.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shit. Okay, I look down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You called that out as you ran to the center of the room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I look down real quick. Do I see any imperfections, anything in the floor, anything that I can--?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: At this moment you have the time to go, "Oh, fuck," and that's what you accomplish.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In that case, I look straight up and I throw a dagger.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Go for it. Roll to attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 17 plus seven.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Hell yeah!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The dagger goes (whooshing, impact) and you hear (gurgling). Roll for damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. A little bit of ichor splatters back down on your face as you look up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not the worst thing that's been on my face today.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. It rotates in space and looks down at you, Obby. And please make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wisdom, not my strength.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: This is going to be rough for me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And that is where you're at. And now it is time for--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is he? Is he stupid? Charmed?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And now it is Devan's turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Can I turn around? Do I see the sigil on the doors?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to open my hand and stick it on there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can. So far it's taken about 20 to 30 seconds to do that, and a round is six seconds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit. Okay. I'm going to try casting-- damn. Chromatic Orb, man, that's my longest range attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's your last--?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I've got two more--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two more?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I've got one more.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, make a ranged attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh wait, did I forget to mark off a Burning Hands?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: You did two.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You did two Burning Hands.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did two Burning Hands? Okay. And I did another Chromatic Orb. So yes, this is my last first level. Okay, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So ranged attack with a plus six on your roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. 24.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What kind was it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I really want to do a thunder attack on somebody.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thunder attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Go for it, man, that sounds pretty good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. So that's 3d8, man.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You hit, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 24, man. No, wait, I did my math wrong. 22, man.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 22? Okay. This crackling ball with little arcs of light spitting out of it flies up, hits the thing. (explosion) The thing spins out of kilter, down, lower-- shite. Aw shite. I don't have the right boxes. I'm going to say he's right there.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Precariously hovering in space.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It spins end over end and starts to right himself and hover right about there. Nice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then I'm going to hide behind Delweth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, okay. Yes, you can do that. Roll for stealth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because I'm smaller.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Oh, yeah. I understand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is his spell on me concentration?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. I heard that question, and I'm ignoring it. Tarvis, it is your turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm so frustrated with how this night is going. I'm questioning my own leadership. And I follow my friend Obby's lead and I throw a dagger at the mini beholder.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hits you in the face.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: And you die.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I go closer if I have to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You could've done it, but it would've been at disadvantage. Now I'll say it is not.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll even go right up against the wall, so I can look in the direction of other people.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's as close as you can get. Chuck it, baby.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's a ten! I am impotent!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The blood from the whip cut is down in your eye and you can't see. You see two of these things? And you got the illusionary one. You got that one. But not the real one. Your dagger hits the ground and clatters and actually spins right down to the ground by you. And now it is Dren's turn.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Could I get to the other side of the room?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can get one, two, three. Where do you want to go? Here?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You could get (counting). That's as close as you can get. You're teensy-weensy.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm teensy-weensy. And then I'm going to shoot at little beholder-man with my crossbow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nathan Beholderman.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: His father, Zyrah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's a 24.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You hit, man.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Is it sneak attack? Eight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Eight? The crossbow bolt sinks into the side of its main eye and juice comes out. You hear the most-- I'm not even going to try to do it, because I had a rough warrior day today yelling for four hours-- the most high-pitched squeal in the side of your own mind, and the thing lurches and stays up, but is gushing out of its large eye in the front. And now it is Delweth's turn.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: How far away is it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's about 40 feet, 50.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Do we have a range on how far I could throw something?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can throw 20 feet well and you can throw 60 feet at disadvantage. So you could throw where you are at disadvantage, or you could run closer.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I'm going to charge in and take my rapier and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, but I was hiding!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Sorry, love. Take my rapier and fling it--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's not what that's for, but you can do it at disadvantage. Or your dagger.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Very good. I'll do it with a dagger.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You pull a dagger out of your belt, you take it by the blade and flick it, and--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I got a ten plus what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Plus five on the dagger.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How do you want to do this? (cheering)

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: How many eyeballs does he have left?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well it always had four. One was limp and hanging and loosey-goosey--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know what that's like.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It had one big eye in the front which Dren gouged the side of. Most of it's there.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Right. I'm going straight in the center of the giant eyeball in the center.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. The thing has just gotten hit in the eye and bounced against the wall and starts to float back in the other direction. And it slowly starts to float downward, its ability to hold itself up weakening and weakening, and it lands slowly on top of Tarvis, falling asleep on him, almost, dying, lowers you down to the ground on the back, slowly and you're okay, you didn't get hurt, but here you are on the ground with a beholder junior sitting on your junk.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Obby, get this thing off of me!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yellow and purple.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I pull out my dagger.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I cast Minor Illusion and make the sound of more dogs barking on the other side of the doorway we came in at?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is Obby released, now that the beholder's dead, from the whatever happened to him?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, he is, he starts to shake his head.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Get me out from under this thing!
