lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tarvis, what did they do to you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I killed it and it fell on me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You are brave and wise leader.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He doesn't need to know, come on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I start cutting him out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: While you guys are talking, you hear down the hall-- (barking)

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: More dogs!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Devan, you fought bravely. Get the doors open, now.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Come on.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, the cabinet? Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I try to open the cabinet, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so you already cut your hand-- you break open your hand and place it. And you wait, and slowly blood pours into it, gets absorbed in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 20 more beholders.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The cabinet doors swing open, and you're looking in at a cabinet. You've never seen this before. You've seen the doors, and your grandmother alluded to it, but you're looking at a shelf, here. And obviously the thing that catches your eye first is an emerald the size of a human head sitting on a large pillow.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We all rush over to take a look. I pick up my scimitar that got thrown across--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I cast Minor Illusion and I cast another big emerald next to it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's two emeralds, you all see. You all see that. There's also a set of--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Which one is the real one? Ask a question that only it would know the answer to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: --panpipes, there's panpipes here, but they're made out of human bones, but they're not the right size for a human. They look child-sized.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Next to the--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, there's a couple of things sitting here. There's two large emeralds, a pair of panpipes made from children's bones. There's a dark medallion made of iron with an eye etched into it, and there's a green leather-bound book here, clasped shut. And that's all that's here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we come up behind Devan? I thought there was only one of these jewels.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did, too. I don't know which one's the real one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are these other trinkets?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Go put your hands on them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't put your hands on anything!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I reach out and grab the green book.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The book? Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What happens?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nothing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you read?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Intelligence of 18.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm pretty sure I can. I open it up. What is it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, you see lists of amounts, mostly. It's pages and pages of lists of amounts, and short-form code in Common with single letters, anagrams. But at the back of the book, there's one page with a list of names in it, and you see words like "Quiver" and next to that "Quinton Puck", and you scan down, looking for names, and you see the word "Shortstack". Next to "Shortstack" is the name "Grimthorne". You see the word "Sandwich", and next to that it says "Wynan Joy." You see the word "Whisper", and next to it it says "Riskel Daxio". Those are the ones that stand out. There's lots. There's about 30 names here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, shit. I take a step out. Everybody try grabbing one item.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I grab the emerald.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: The real one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, the real one.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I go and grab the other emerald.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Your hands go--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: What the fuck?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Must be some sort of trap that the grandma left.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: It's a fake. Everyone be careful. What do you have in your hands?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I grab the iron thing with the eye.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The medallion? Okay. You have to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I try to pass it to Dren.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like secretly, or just hand it to her?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here, you hold this, I'll try grabbing something else. And then I try grabbing something else in the room.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: After I stepped out--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You pick up a pair of pipes made from children's bones.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As she's reaching for the pipes made from children's bones, I look at Obby, and I say, I got what I came for. I walk up behind Devan, I take a dagger, and I reach around and slice her throat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I cast Mirror Image and I--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Sneak attack. Didn't see it coming.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Roll for stealth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: One.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's my passive perception is 11.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then you're fine. Both of you roll for initiative.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Goddamn you piece of shit! (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Seven. Do whatever you want to do, Devan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I cast Mirror Image.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What does that do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That creates three other images of myself.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There are suddenly multiple Devans.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I take off running.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Which way?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I run straight forward.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're all over here, right? Okay. This way?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but all my mirror images are going to run different directions, so he won't know which one is me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Tarvis, what would you like to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many of her are there?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's four and you can't tell which one is the real one. Two are running towards the door, two are running to the sides of the room.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I look to Obby and say: Devan doesn't need to live; this ledger is all that matters.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You want the one on the right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's go for the two running towards the doors.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're going to aim for the two at the door?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You attack, what are you doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are two of them heading towards the opposite door or are they standing right where she was?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One Devan is here, one Devan is here, two are right next to each other one just ahead of the other.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'll take the one that's just behind the one that's ahead of the other.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will throw a dagger at the other one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well you're not doing anything, you are.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not doing anything, I'm looking at the medallion.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I wish I had a coin. All right. I know what I'll do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, it's a d2, don't you have a d2?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm good. So roll to attack.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do the percentage die, we never get to use those!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Roll to attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Finally.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 18? Okay. Roll for damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, it's a four for a dagger. Five.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know what your hit points are, guys, I'm going to go on the honor code here. Five points? You feel a dagger sink into your back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait! No! If I roll a d20, I determine whether the attack hits me or another one of my duplicates.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well there you go, I don't know that spell, sorry. The mirror image next to you goes (sizzling).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Oh shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought she has to roll a d20?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, wait, I have to roll a d20. If I roll a six or higher, then it attacks a duplicate. The duplicate's AC equals ten plus my dexterity modifier, so 11.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Well he rolled a 17.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So it would've hit it, but that's if-- Whoa, if I roll a six or higher and I rolled a six. So if an attack hits a duplicate the duplicate is destroyed!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, you still don't know which one is the real one. I mean, I know you do, but Tarvis doesn't know which one is real.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tarvis is pretty dumb.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tarvis has an intelligence of 18, he would probably think the two that were trying to leave the room were--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. everybody roll for initiative right now

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh jeez Louise.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, everybody roll and then 20 to 25?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 24. Obby, Dren is 20?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, next? 15 to 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 20 as well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 20 as well. Okay, ten to 15.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, and that leaves Del?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Seven for me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Obby, what would you like to do in this moment?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I would like to attack one of the to be determined duplicates.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, you aimed at me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You hit me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Roll for damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, seven damage?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seven damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Would I have any idea how to actually get out of this room?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, not in this second.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are the doors still slammed shut?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, the doors are sealed closed.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are the doors still sealed shut? Oh shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have the ledger in your hands?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do, I tucked it away. It's not in my hands, I tucked away.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well depends whose turn it is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's currently, fuck these 'D' names! It is Dren's turn.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Could I try to steal it from Tarvis?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Steal the--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: The ledger.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sleight of hand.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Am I close enough to just do it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But you're one of us, you're one of the Clasp.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's in love with Devan.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You move over ten feet and what do you do?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I try to steal the ledger.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Make a sleight of hand check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Come on, ones.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dren runs forward and slams into you and says, "Don't worry, I've got this." As you say that, you pull the book out and stick it up your shirt and hold your weapon out.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, now what do I do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's all you do.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's all I do? Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can move a little if you want.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I try and dash forward?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, you have three movement left and your dash as a bonus action is another five, so you can go eight. Where do you want to go?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Toward Devan, but I don't know which one is the real one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, you don't, none of us do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Roll that d20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How would she know?!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll give it away, though, won't I? Right, I don't want to give it away. I'll run as far as I can to the opposite side of the room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, here.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: All right, could you tell me who everybody is?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is now Devan's turn. Here is Dren. Here is Devan. Here is Delweth. Here's Tarvis. Here's Obby.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh.

lines.name: SAM, LIAM
lines.text: Obby the Rat!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is it your turn?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's my turn. I don't have any idea how to get out of this room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you Misty?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I really can't.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't help her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's my family.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god. Okay, I'm going to use two more of my sorcery points and get another level one spell and I'm going to cast Color Spray at the three of them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, no, you're confusing them. So you turn this way.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Describe Color Spray, what does it do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Color Spray is a dazzling array of flashing colored light.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Lot of color tonight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Creatures in a 15-foot cone originating from me. Is there any way to get all three in the cone?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 15-foot cone?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who can I get?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If you want to move forward, you can get them together.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'll get them.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: What does it do to us? Just blinds us?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I'm going to roll 6d10.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Holy shit!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no it doesn't do that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's not damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it for what color it is?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then it makes you go blind if I get you, if your hit points are low enough.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Delweth, how many hit points do you have right now?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: How many hit points do I have left?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tarvis, how many do you have?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Three? You have three hit points? Yes, so that's one, two, three, four, five, so I have one more. That's nine plus nine is 18, (counting) plus nine is 32.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Blasts you guys in the eyes, it scorches and all you see is white. All you see is white. You are both blind.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All three of us are blind?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just you two. Obby can see. Fuck a duck, where did I put my initiative order? Oh my god, it's the end of the world. Oh man. Dren and Delweth both went right?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I haven't gone yet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dangit, you go, Delweth. That's right somewhere on one of these papers is the order.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was first.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Delweth, go for now.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it was your turn, it's your turn next.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Why are you looking at me like that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you going to be a fucking Lannister or you going to be a Gryffindor right now?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, it's not Delweth's turn right now it is--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I haven't gone. I had seven. I was the last.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I went, because I stole the ledger.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, go for it Delweth.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: All right, I am going to-- fuck. I don't know what to do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bad scene, man.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I am going to--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can do anything with disadvantage at this point.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: All right. I'm going to, 60 feet, Acid Splash. In my brain, try and remember where I saw Devan, and I'm going to blindly cast Acid Splash.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, roll a ranged spell attack. You add your modifier. No, actually, sorry, Devan, you make a dex save at advantage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Natural 20!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And it sizzles.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it sizzle near the sigil?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, it does not sizzle near the siggle. And now it is Tarvis's turn.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Do I get a bonus action?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I'm going to take three steps to my left and try and find the wall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're right here, and your back is against the wall.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: All right, I'm going to slide three steps to my left against the wall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, you can feel you're brushing past Tarvis as you go.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Tarvis, it's your turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have two daggers left, so I'm going to take a second one and chuck it in the direction that I think Devan was in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You hear her butt hit the ground.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's at disadvantage, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, the butt thumping. 12.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have 11. Wait! Wait, no, I still have mirror images!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are they up?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yup, two of them are up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He can't see any of them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a seven, so he still would've rolled for an attack on that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I thought it was six or less.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Six or higher.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Six or higher, you're fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, and I rolled a seven.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Seven on the mirror image.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So one of them disappears, there's only one mirror image left.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Poof, okay. Knife sinks into the back of a fake and goes (poof) like a Naruto clone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you dead yet? You will be soon, you conniving bitch!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Obby, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Obby the Rat takes no joy in this--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait! And my bonus action. I will take my superior healing potion.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Damn it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I need an eight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Damn it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You guys go ahead, sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, Obby the Rat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I take no joy in attacking you, but it is my duty, I'm sorry. 20.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What did you attack with?

lines.name: SAM, LIAM
lines.text: The dagger.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I throw dagger.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What happens with your last image?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He hits the mirror image!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Wait, my superior is only 8d4.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Superior is 8d8, right? 8d8 plus six?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, 8d8 plus eight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, 8d4.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 8d4 plus eight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ours say 8d8.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's supposed to be 8d4.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Son of a bitch.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So I hit the mirror image, even though I saw her shoot rainbows out of her hands?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The mirror image shot rainbows from its hands, too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like a kaleidoscope. It was amazing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Colors I don't like.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dren, you are up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can everyone see now? Or is everyone still blind?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, they're still blind until their next turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, and I used some movement to go a little bit closer to her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This way?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So they still can't see?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It doesn't look like they can see.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to give you an eight-count.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. I hold up the ledger and I go, Stop! Everyone stop fighting. If anyone makes another move, I'm going to rip this ledger to shreds.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we here for the ledger, Tarvis, or the jewel?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I also have the emerald. I have both things currently.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: You have the emerald as well?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: What the fuck are we here for, Tarvis?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The emerald. You can tear up the ledger.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I shatter the emerald, can I do that, is the emerald destroyable?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Then I'll destroy the emerald.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is that your action?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm threatening to, unless everyone stands down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dren, you are one of us, why are you doing this?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Because I love Devan!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are you talking about, she's a gir-- ooh.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You know that if you leave here, no matter where you go, we will find you, and we will kill you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It doesn't matter, I'll take care of her, I have a lot of magic.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's coming out of a dead woman as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Dren, she has betrayed her own family, don't you think she will betray you too over gambling debts? I live with my wife, her mother, her mother, and her mother, and I hate them all, but we all get along because we are family. She will lie and stab you in the back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I would never!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: She will, she told me she would when we were alone together.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I did not.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yes, she did.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She told me she was going to protect me.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: She told me that she was going to kill everyone.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Look, you guys, I don't want anyone to get hurt! The truth is I always wanted to be a poet, but my father forced me to be an assassin rogue. I don't even want this emerald. I just want Devan and I to be able to go and live our lives in peace.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If you smash that emerald, you will not walk out of here alive.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: If I give you the emerald, will you let us go?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: During the conversation, it fades away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aw, man.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Throw me the idol? Give me the whip?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: All right. What do we do? Get the emerald?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You guys open that hatch and I won't shatter the emerald.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: What hatch? We don't know how to get--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: The thing in the middle! The thing that Abby was trying to open.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Obby! Obby the Rat!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: We should kill her for not knowing your name.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can open any door, I can open that door if that's what you want open, but we need that jewel.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: If you let us get down the hatch, I'll toss it back up to you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think we just kill them now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Both?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: While she was talking, can I have tried to pry open the hatch?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, stop trying to pry open the hatch! (laughter)

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Are they both in the center of the room, trying to pry open the hatch?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to say for that she backed up, you walked forward, you guys didn't move.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tarvis, I follow orders. You tell me what to do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kill them. Now.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I cast Burning Hands on both of them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everybody roll initiative again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aw, come on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to die.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think we both are.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 16, okay. Ten to 15? Five to ten?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't have everybody. Devan, what did you roll? Three. Dren, go.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Should I smash the emerald?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everybody can tell, everybody's moving, you see everybody moving at the same time. What are you going to do?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Tied together in a glorious love-- beautiful moment.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to move in front of Devan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait. Why are we seated at these tables? (laughter)

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: It's all clear now.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And while I'm moving, can I give her the emerald?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Make a sleight of hand check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Plop it into her hands, yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And then I'm going to whisper--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got like a human head inside of my shirt right now.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I whisper, get out of here if you can. And then I attack Tarvis.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Dren!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Am I close enough to use the shortsword?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If you take one step forward, you are. Do you want to do that?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to get so ganked. Yes. Bloop! 18 plus six.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that hits.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And then seven damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, god.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, blade sinks into his hip. Now we're on to-- why can't I read these names?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The 'D' one.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I had 17.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I had 18.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Delweth, Tarvis.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I'm overcome with nostalgia of when she was cool.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And you swing your blade down as hard as you can, because you love the Clasp, you serve the Clasp, and this little shit betrays you? You bring your scimitar down, you go whoop, take a step to the side. The scimitar hits the ground and shatters into two pieces.

lines.name: LAURA, ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, shit!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're now holding a dagger.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And a whip.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: And a whip that you cut your face with.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Delweth, you're up.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Right. Do I have a clean shot at these two?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: To do what?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: To kill them. I need a 15-foot cone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You'll hit Dren.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I'll hit Dren. Can I move?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Kablam.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Kaboom. I want to make sure it's just the two of them in range. I cast Burning Hands.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: What do I have to do? Burning Hands. Each creature must make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Versus your DC, so your DC is 13. You've got to beat 13 with a dex save.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, you beat it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You beat it. But you take half damage. So roll for damage. Yeah. They both made the save. So Delweth puts her hands together, fans out the fingers, fire shoots out, for a total of three? Four. It blasts, and if they had been human, they would have been cooked, but because they're so short, it goes over their heads as they crouch down.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yeah, you take four damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Four damage each?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, Obby the Rat, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Go get it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I attack Dren. I do not like haiku.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know why they call me Obby the Rat? I can sniff out a traitor.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Really? It took you a long time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I failed! Three!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Plus what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seven? I don't know. Do you have an AC of ten?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Devan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bonus action, I disengage and run back.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Oh, that was mine as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to put my bloody hand down on the floor underneath me, and I'm going to cast Minor Illusion. Oh, god. And I'm going to cast an image of the ledger across the room, like over towards the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The ledger?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, the emerald. The emerald rolling across the floor towards the door.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It can't move.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It can't move?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Minor Illusion, I don't think it moves.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll allow it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "I'll allow it."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And now we're at the top again, so Dren.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. There's no situation in which I can get a sneak attack on anyone, is there? If I dash underneath anyone or--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The only friend you have left is here, and there's nowhere to hide in here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's going to get you killed.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll do it for love. I'm going to attack Tarvis again. 17.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What am I doing? d6. Seven.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You feel the blood, hot.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As hot as my rage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tarvis, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Again, I try to hit something with a pulse.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: With your broken, weird dagger, or the whip?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With the whip! That'll hit, 19.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you, Jesus. A one plus two for a whopping fucking three.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: We suck!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You feel a sting, a cut on your neck, and blood starts to pour lightly down your neck.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As a bonus action, I will take a greater healing potion.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Man, this is a long game. Wow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shouldn't have given us so many potions.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I know. One each. That's all you need. I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Continue.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Next is Delweth.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Fuck. Really?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Who's that right over the grate?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is Devan.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (strained) You can sneak attack on Dren because I'm engaged with her.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Oh, all right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If you attack with a weapon.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I'm going to attack Dren with my rapier.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so you're going to move up.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yes, get sneak attack. What do I do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Roll to attack.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Just roll this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, roll to attack first.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are the motherfuck-- I don't know what--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I missed, I had a three.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you want to do anything else with a bonus action?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I'm going to stay where I am.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, Obby, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Devan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, with bonus action, sleight of hand, I attempt to remove her pouch with healing potions.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Roll.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Devan, go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I keep my hand with the blood on the sigil on the ground. I don't know if it's doing anything.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It doesn't feel like anything's doing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit! I guess then I'll do Ray of Frost up at Obby's face.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's such a lie. 23.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Still really good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So that's 1d8, then. That's three. That's it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're like a bunch of drunks trying to kill each other with foam noodles.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I say, look! Look! The jewel is yours! Why are you still attacking me? I don't even want it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You do see the jewel across the room. Dren, you're up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Does it take anything to roll perception to see if there's anything I can do to this thing on the ground? Or to see if there's any other way to get out?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can, sure. That'll be your whole action and move if you want. You can do a perception check if you want, though.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: My perception is bunk. There's no sweeping attacks I can do, I'm assuming. I can't do a crazy flourish?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. You can disengage to get away out of that little kill box, and then I'd let you do perception if you want.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That sounds smart.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to move out of the kill box. Disengage. I guess next to Devan.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sure. And then I'll do a perception.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Perception check, roll.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (singing) Son of a bitch. If only it had been a one. It's a two.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a two? I don't know, man, it's hectic in here. On to Tarvis.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I run up to Devan, and I look at Dren, and I say, this is your last chance. If you don't give her up, I'm going to paralyze her and torture her in front of you for a week. And then maybe I'll let her die. I attack Devan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, you! 17!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That hits me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I get sneak attack on it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, it's me. Six. Seven. Ten.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey! That's some real damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Think about it. Think about the offer. I'm talking bad torture.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Delweth, you're up.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Fuck me. Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Plus, you'll live.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I stabbed you twice!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Death's a certainty.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I am a member of the Clasp, so I attack Devan.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, go.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: With my rapier! Yes. There's no sneak. Was I behind anybody?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sneak attack because she's flanked. You roll at advantage because she's flanked.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you pass out?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I go unconscious, but then if they keep hitting, I get three death saving throws.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Aren't you attacking with the rapier?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Then I do 1d8. Hey! 11.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And sneak attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Down?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Zero.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Devan!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Obby, you're up.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Do I get a bonus action? I'd like to go back up behind Tarvis.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Over here? Okay. Obby the Rat, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tarvis. Devan or Dren?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Devan. Do it. Devan's unconscious, so it's an automatic two death saving throws.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, if you hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All I did was play some poker.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Obby follows orders. I roll a two.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's an automatic crit, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. You lean in and go--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It just hits? So what do I roll? Is she dead?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I've got one more death saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Holy shit. That was so mean of me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You push in, and you watch her back, like a hole wells up in her back. None of you are good people. Nobody here is a good person.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I use sleight of hand to try and steal her jewel from her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's across the room on the floor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it's not, it would've gone away as soon as I died.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Sleight of hand? You'd have to see it. I mean, she's probably lying on top of it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well then I take the healing potions. 19.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. All right, Dren, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You could give me a healing potion and wake me up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Think about it, Dren. Life awaits you on the other side of this choice. You can live, drink wine, find someone else.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to give Devan a healing potion.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How many is it? 4d4 or 8d4?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: The superior?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's the only one I have left. You can roll them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do death saving throws reset? Do they, Lemur?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes. She's awake. I'm going to say, to pour that all into her mouth and make sure it goes down, that's your action. You can move if you want to.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I can't do another perception? That would be another action? Okay. Can I pry at the sigil?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe on your next turn, you can.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, that's it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Tarvis, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's me? Great. I would like to go and strike Devan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, I didn't get to go? My turn was after Dren's.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You got to wake up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're after Obby.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just kidding. I had the lowest, I forgot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's your AC?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Awesome.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh man, poor Laura Bailey.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: It's not Laura Bailey, it's Devan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're right. Obby has no feelings.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bang. You want to do a bonus action?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nope. Delweth.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Right. Going back with my rapier. I don't have anything stronger than that, really. I'm going to keep the last thing that I have. I'm going to run up and rapier.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're going to rapier?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Rapier. I said rapier.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Roll that die.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: 17 plus--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: And then the rapier is-- (counting)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm back to zero. It doesn't matter, I'm back to zero.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, she's down. Okay. Delweth, you want to do anything on a bonus?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I want to go back behind Tarvis.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. So you dart around, then you darted back. Obby the Rat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I turn to Dren and say, where is the jewel? Tell me or I kill your friend right now.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You'll kill us anyway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. I rolled an 11 to kill Devan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well that's two death saving throws gone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Any bonus, Obby the Rat?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to search her body.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You get down and you start looking, and you feel something hard. And now it is Dren's turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Think about what you're doing.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I use one of my weapons to do it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, go ahead, expose your neck for us while you're doing it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Roll a strength check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, so it's 18?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, you bring it down as hard as you can, and scratches-- it ruins the surface. It is still shut.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. And that's all I can do, really, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can move if you want to.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, I'll stay right there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Tarvis, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You betrayer. Watch her die.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's terrible.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tarvis.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I take my dagger out, and I kneel down over Devan, and I take the knife, and I stick it in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, what a dick!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And then I--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Her body jiggles on the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm dead, yo.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Delweth, what would you like to do?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I go over to your body.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My body. My sad little teeny-tiny halfling body.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Does she have the emerald? Is that what we discovered?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm still searching around there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Obby's on her. As Tarvis did that, he's got his hands on it in a split-second.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can surmise that that's what's going on.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: You swore an oath to the Clasp. That's what you did, and you've betrayed us all. And I take my rapier and I attack her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, roll to hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're hardened criminals, right? This is what we do, right? It feels real wrong!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hits.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: 19. Sorry, love.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You're not sorry! Is this sneak attack?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. She's engaged, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes. Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is she?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But you would have to move down. No, it's not sneak attack. No, sorry.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Eight, total. Okay. You slash right down her front in a long cut across her chest. Anything else?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I go back behind Tarvis.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. Obby the Rat. You dart back, you come around go-- you slash at her and then whip around, get your place. Obby the Rat.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I find the jewel?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Got it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Find jewel. I look at sigil on ground. Any symbol that looks like previous symbols? How do we get out of the room?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: It's a new sigil?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's not a sigil, it's a geometric pattern on the ground.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What if we--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just kill her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sighs) I throw dagger at Dren.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Go. Attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who's now engaged.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, hits. No, there's no sneak attack. The only person near her is Devan. You guys are not within five feet of her.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought Delweth hit her with a rapier.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She bounced back on that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seven points.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hope that feels real good, Alby.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you still standing? Dren's still standing?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Dren's still standing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Dren, you're up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to take this action to rip up the ledger that I have.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! What's up, motherfucker?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I rip it into shreds, and I say a haiku, which is this: Though I die today/At least with my love I go/Fuck all you bastards!

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: B-A-S-S T-U-R-D-S. They are fish, they are shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was probably your finest haiku.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: May be your final act on earth. Tarvis, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, that ledger. I'm going to kill Dren.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: One!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Six plus eight and-- yeah. 12.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are you using to do this?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My whip.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's so shitty.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I am extremely dead.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The whip wraps around her neck and you yank and pull, and she chokes out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Would you guys mind if I finished that off?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: No. I have no problem with that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. I take a dagger, and I know she's unconscious.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. We don't need an action for this, go ahead.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I turn her head towards Devan and sink it in the neck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's terrible.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's dead.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Betrayal's a bitch. I'm dead, you guys, I really needed that ledger. Is it in shreds? Is it tapeable? I mean, did she office mash that shit, or is it--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's shredded! It's the most shredded! I came from the afterlife to shred!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If you can find Percival de Rolo to invent tape, then maybe you could tape it together. The pieces are there. The names are there. I mean, she's not a paper shredder.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, good. I put them in a satchel. Are those sconces around the room? Four sconces?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're magical transparent globes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They're just orbs. Can we go back into the room?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In here? Sure. You're going in there?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'll go in there, because I'm probably dead anyway. Can I pick up the baby finger pipes?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I try and play some music on that shit?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I had the baby finger pipes on my body.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're not there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They're not there? Oh, then I go and Dren-- oh, she doesn't have them. Oh, look, they're on Devan's stupid dead body. Can I try and play some music?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (raspberry sound)

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: We're going to die in here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What else is in that room?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're going to do a perception check?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Yeah. All of us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're all in there? There's room for two people to go in. Who's in?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, you both-- really, you were so bedazzled by what you saw on the shelf. You didn't really look around this little room. There are three levers directly to the right of the door on the wall.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Is there anything around these levers at all? Anything? Any markings, any arcane something?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, just three.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey, there's three of us. Let's all grab one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's not room for the three of you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have two hands.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How about I do the one that's furthest into the room?

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: He's a little tiny guy, isn't he?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who's going?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You have multiple hands that you can use to pull levers.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I've got a Mage Hand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jesus, pull some fucking levers!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: While this is going on, I'm cutting off Devan's hand.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. So three levers are getting pulled--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: But I'm stepping out of the room and casting my Mage Hand.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just the one that's closest to the back of the wall first.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tell me what's happening.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have my left hand on the one that's furthest in the room. Right hand on the middle one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And you're in there. You're standing outside.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: And I use my Mage Hand to pull the other.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But we're only doing one at a time.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One at a time? All right. So you're outside, waiting. You're inside. Okay. So you're pulling first?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. The deepest one in the room. Crank.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. Delweth and Obby immediately take 8d6 electric damage from the floor in the circular room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who rolls that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll do it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (whispers) This was a suicide mission.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh man, if I'd grabbed that lever when I was in there grabbing that big jewel.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Delweth and Obby take 31 points of damage.

lines.name: SAM, MARY
lines.text: Dead.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Unconscious? Electrified, up in smoke.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are they unconscious or dead?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They are smoking and on the ground.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I only have one healing potion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I have tons.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I do, too. Take them from my body.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. I run out and go, oh, jeez-- wait a minute. Is the floor still electrified? I put the lever back up. I run out, I pour one greater healing potion into Obby's mouth. He wakes up and I go, hi, I need a healing potion. I run over and pour it into Delweth's mouth.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Because I have a superior.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That didn't work so awesome. How about I'll stand out here now, and one of you go in there and pull the second one in case--

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I've got to roll some-- what do we do to get back to--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (sizzling sound)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What was that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There is a little old woman standing in the closet behind you. She raises a staff. "You "fucking assholes." There is a transparent cage around the three of you, now. She walks out, click, clack, click.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Shrew.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The air around you grows dry. You feel the moisture in your bodies pull out. You remember that scene at the end of the Last Crusade? With the cup? All the moisture leaves your body, and your skin gets dry and flakes away, and your sight goes, and the world grows dark, and you guys fall, three husks upon the ground. The cage shrinks, shrinks, dragging your three bodies together. Five bodies together. "You don't fuck the Shrew. The Shrew screws you." And she moves her hand, and the circle in the middle fans open, and five bodies fall down through a tube and land in a pile of mimic corpse. Click, click, click. "Fuck family." (laughter) (cheering)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All that work.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: Never got a chance to kill you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You were trying to kill him?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everybody tell the group the secret I gave you. Starting with Obby. What's the secret I gave you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That I love Tarvis?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's it, no secrets.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not romantically. I'm indebted to you and I would do anything for you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's so sweet!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I had to steal the ledger, which was the real objective, and Devan knew too much to be left alive. She had to die.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: I knew that we were going to kill Devan at the end of this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I also knew that.

lines.name: MARY
lines.text: And I also knew that I was passed over for you, so I was going to kill you, because I was jealous of power. I know, you kept turning to me going, "Are you a Lannister?" I'm like, fuck!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ashly, what was Dren's secret?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, it was very well-kept, that I was in love with Devan and I wanted to run away with her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think your first line of dialogue was, "I'm in love with you secretly!" (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "I'm secretly in love with you!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And Devan, why don't you tell Dren what your secret is?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (yelling)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You are not the father!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I didn't want to! He made me! I didn't want to do it! I even asked him, I'm like, can I choose not to betray her?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I said no. You're all bad people.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I know. Dren's a little dummy, so she would've gone for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You could've lived, man.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Fuck no, I would've died, please.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was awesome.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're all assholes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thanks, everybody, you guys, the five of you, and thanks, everybody, for watching if you hung in to the end. I know it was long. I don't know how to balance anything or know how long things take. I threw a bunch of spaghetti at the wall. But it was fun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You done good, bro.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You done real good.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you to Loot Crate! (cheering)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh boy, Harley Quinn!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Matt, Marisha, Taliesin, come home, and is it Thursday yet? [music]
